2003 LQ1.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of a Seaplane Tender as Flagship along with an escort consisting of Destroyers and Coastal Defense Ships, then using your seaplane based fleet, sortie into the Nansei Island Defense Line, Eastern Orel Sea Area, and the Waters off of Okinoshima. Within the same waters confront the same enemy fleet and destroy them!
* Organize a fleet with 1 AV as flagship, 2 DD, 3 XX , then score an A+ rank on the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-3 and 2-4.

'''Limited Time Quest'''

Prepare 2500 Ammunition, 4000 Bauxite, 1 {{EquipmentLink|New Model Aerial Armament Material}}, and 1 {{EquipmentLink|Skilled Crew Member}} in your inventory. Have {{ShipLink|Gotland}} as secretary equipped with a ★max {{EquipmentLink|Swordfish (Seaplane Model)}} on her first slot. Scrap 3 {{EquipmentLink|Zuiun}}, 3 {{EquipmentLink|Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane}}, and 1 {{EquipmentLink|Type 13 Air Radar Kai}}.

2101 LQ1.detail_en:
Sortie an elite escort fleet of destroyers and escorts (1 light carrier and 1 light cruiser type ship at most) to the sea near the Nansei Islands and the Coastal Refinery Zone! Furthermore, carry out ASW duty near the naval base as well as a transport convoy escort operation, then patrol the Brunei anchorage area in the south-western sea!
* Sortie a fleet of 0-1 CVL, 0-1 CL(T)/CT at most and 4-6 DD/DE ('''No other ship classes allowed'''). Score an A+ rank at the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 1-5, and 7-1. Reach Node N on 1-6.

Form an elite fleet with a CA(V) as flagship and at least another one, then deploy it to the Nansei Islands Defence Line near the naval base as well as the Bashi Island Strait, Eastern Orel Sea, Okinoshima Island and its surrounding sea in the Nansei Islands area! Eliminate the enemy fleets and secure control of the sea during the new year!
*Form a fleet with 2 CA(V) (with one as flagship), and 4 XX and sortie and score an A+ rank on the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, and 2-5.

Form an auxiliary fleet with at least 3 CV(B/L)/AV/AS/AO, then deploy it several times to the entire northern sea (3-4), Barents Sea (E-2), Nordkapp / Arctic Ocean (E-3), and eliminate the enemy fleets in each of these areas!

[Extra Operation Mission] Organize an elite fleet in the first fleet, and sortie into the Northern AL Operation area, the Western Curry Ocean alongside Ri Lanka, the Southwestern Waters along Tawi-Tawi Anchorage and Penang Island pass the Malacca Strait and successfully destroy the enemy main fleets! First Fleet, carve victory into the dawn of the new year of the Third Year of Reiwa!

"Setsubun Mission" Organize a fleet consisting of 2 Destroyer or 2 Destroyer Escorts and carry out a Setsubun Exercise with said fleet! While performing the exercise for the 3rd Year of Reiwa, score a victory 3 times in the day!

* Organize a fleet with at least 2 DD/DE and 4 XX in your fleet and win 3 PVP with an S rank in a day.

"Setsubun Extra Mission" Organize a fleet consisting of a Battleship or Standard Carrier as Flagship and 2 destroyers within it and proceed to the Southern Waters of the Coral Sea area, the Northern Salmon Sea Area, and to the shore off Peacock Island in the Central Waters. Valentine's Limited Mission: Organize a fleet with a light cruiser as flagship and sortie into the Oil Refinery Area, 
Okashima Island Area, Northern Moray Sea, The Alfansols, and the Curry Ocean Operation in the Western Sea. Destroy the main enemy fleets in the area!

Hinamatsuri Operation: Organize a fleet that includes 3 Destroyers or Coastal Defense ships. Sortie into the Sea around the Nansei Islands, the Coastal Refinery Zone, the Seas Near the Naval Base, and the Sea Route Near Naval Base. Successfully complete each operation.

2103 B2.detail_en:
Hinamatsuri Operation: Organize a fleet that includes 4 Destroyers or Coastal Defense ships. Sortie into the Nansei Islands Coastal Waters, the Bashi Island Strait, and the Eastern Orel Bay. Capture and destroy the enemy fleet and secure control of each area!

2103 B2.title_en: (Hinamatsuri Operation) Springtime combat patrols in the Nansei Islands sea!

2103 B3.detail_en:
Hinamatsuri Operation: Organize a powerful fleet that includes at least 1 Aircraft Carrier, 1 Heavy Cruiser or Aviation Cruiser and 1 Light Cruiser, then proceed to the Okinoshima Island, Combat Patrol Off Okinoshima, and the deepest part of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage Sea.
*Sortie a fleet that consists of 1 CV(B/L), 1 CA(V), 1 CL and 3XX and score a S-Rank victory at the boss nodes of 2-4, 2-5, and 7-2 (Part 2), twice each.

2103 B4.detail_en:
Hinamatsuri Extra Operation: Organize a powerful fleet and sortie into the Northern AL Waters, the Curry Ocean Ri-Lanka Island, and the Central Northern Offshore Sea of Peacock Island. Use the full power of your fleet to destroy the enemy fleet!
*Sortie any fleet and score a S-Rank victory at the boss nodes of 3-5, 4-5 and 6-4 once.

2103 B4.title: 【桃の節句：拡張作戦】春の攻勢作戦！
2103 B4.title_en: (Hinamatsuri Extra Operation) Spring's proactive battle operation!

Limited Spring Quest: Organize a fleet in which part of it consists of the 16th Destroyer Division member [[Amatsukaze]] as flagship along with 1 other member being [[Yukikaze]], [[Tokitsukaze]] or [[Hatsukaze]] as the 2nd ship in the fleet. Sortie into the the Nansei Island Sea's Bashi Channel, Eastern Orel Sea, and South Western Sea's Deepest part of the Malacca Strait going into Penang confront the main enemy fleet and destroy them multiple times.

*Organize a fleet consists of [[Amatsukaze]] as flagship, a ship in the 2nd slot that can be either [[Yukikaze]], [[Tokitsukaze]] or [[Hatsukaze]], and 4 XX. Then score an S rank on the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-3 and 7-3 (Part 2) twice each.

Sortie Mission: Organize a Fleet consisting of 1 Light Cruiser, 2 Destroyers or Escorts, an Aviation Cruiser or Light Aircraft Carrier in your first fleet. Deploy them to each area of the Nansei Island Waters and destroy the enemy main fleet in each operation successfully!
* Organize a fleet with 1 CL, 2DD or DE, 1 CAV or CVL, and 2 wildcards and sortie them through 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, and 2-5 and score an A rank on each boss node.

Sortie Mission: Sortie the New Seventh Squadron to the Curry Ocean area off Ri Lanka "Abyssal Eastern Ocean Fleet Reduction Operation" and the MS Island Operation "Defense of the MS Archipelago", engage the enemy main fleet and destroy them!
* Sortie a fleet with [[Kumano|Kumano Kai Ni (or Kai Ni Kou)]] as the flagship along with [[Suzuya|Suzuya Kai Ni (or Kai Ni Kou)]] as the second ship, [[Mogami|Mogami Kai]],[[Mikuma|Mikuma Kai]] and two wild cards, score an S rank on 4-5 and 6-2 at the boss node.
B101.label: B101
B101.note: CVL versions of [[Suzuya]] and [[Kumano]] can be used here if necessary.
B101.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Medal}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber)}}
B101.title: 新編「第七戦隊」、出撃せよ！

B102.detail_en:
Elite "Fourth Carrier Division" Sortie Mission: Deploy the Elite Main Aviation Battleship Force known as the "Fourth Carrier Division" and weigh Anchor! Proceed to conduct Combat Patrol off Okinoshima and the Northern AL Ocean Area, capture the main enemy forces and eliminate them!
* Take [[Ise]] and [[Hyuuga]] as your flagship and Second ship and have 1 CL, 2DD, and one wild card to 2-5 and 3-5 and score an A rank at each boss node.
B102.label: B102
B102.title: 精鋭「第四航空戦隊」、抜錨せよ！

B103.detail_en:
Sortie Mission: Deploy your first fleet consisting of [[Yura|Yura Kai Ni]] as your flagship along with 2 of the following ships consisting of [[Yuudachi]]. [[Murasame]], [[Harusame]], [[Samidare]], and/or [[Akizuki]] to the Eastern Orel Sea and the Forefront of the Southern Seas to engage the main enemy forces and destroy them!
*Have [[Yura|Yura Kai Ni]] as your flagship along with 2 other ships from either [[Yuudachi]]. [[Murasame]], [[Harusame]], [[Samidare]] and/or [[Akizuki]] in your fleet, along with 3 other wildcards and send them to 2-3 and 5-1 and score an S rank at the boss nodes.
B103.label: B103
B103.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Skilled Crew Member}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft}} {{QuestRewardItem|Reinforcement Expansion}}
B103.title: 旗艦「由良」、抜錨！

B104.detail_en:
Sortie mission: Sortie a powerful torpedo squadron that's including the reorganised elite DesDiv 22 to Kis Island in the northern sea, then have it complete the Kis Island evacuation mission flawlessly.
*Sortie a fleet including [[Fumizuki|Fumizuki Kai Ni]], [[Satsuki|Satsuki Kai Ni]], [[Nagatsuki|Nagatsuki Kai]], [[Minazuki|Minazuki Kai]], and up to 2 additional ships to 3-2 and score an S-rank.
B104.label: B104
B104.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Irako|qty=2}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft}} {{QuestRewardItem|Reinforcement Expansion}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}}
B104.title: 精鋭「第二二駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B105.detail_en:
Deploy [[Saratoga|Saratoga Mk.II]] or Mod. 2 as your flagship along with the "Task Force" to the Southern Waters North of the Salmon Sea and to the Central Waters at the waters off of the MS Archipelago, within these waters overpower the main enemy fleet and destroy them! 
*Sortie [[Saratoga|Saratoga Mk.II]] or Mod. 2 consisting of 1 CL, 2DD, and 2 Wild Cards to 5-5 and 6-2 and score an S-rank.
B105.label: B105
B105.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|F6F-3}} {{QuestRewardItem|Skilled Crew Member}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Aerial Armament Material}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|TBF}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Night Operation Aviation Personnel}}
B105.title: 精強大型航空母艦、抜錨！
B105.title_en: Reinforced Large Aircraft Carrier, Weigh Anchor!

B106.detail_en:
Deploy [[Saratoga|Saratoga Mk.II]] as your flagship to the offshore area of the KW Atoll, intercept the enemy Carrier Task force and successfully succeed at "Intercepting the Main Enemy Carrier Unit"! Night Operation Carrier, Weigh anchor and sortie to the Front Lines!
*Sortie [[Saratoga|Saratoga Mk.II]] along with 5 other ships sortie to 6-5 and score an S-rank
B106.label: B106
B106.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|TBF}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Aerial Armament Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Night Operation Aviation Personnel + Skilled Deckhands}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Reinforcement Expansion}} {{QuestRewardItem|Skilled Crew Member}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Aerial Armament Material}}
B106.title: 精強大型航空母艦、抜錨！
B106.title_en: Night Operation Carrier, sortie to the Front Lines!

B107.detail_en:
Organize a vigilant Fleet consisting of a Light Cruiser Class flagship and at least 2 Destroyers or Destroyer Escorts. With the same fleet vigilantly patrol the Naval Base Waters (Coastal Oil Refinery Area/Nansei Island Defense Line/ Waters Adjacent to the Naval Base) and safely secure the supply line!
*Sortie 1 CL as Flagship + 2DD/DE to 1-3,1-4,an 1-5 and score at least an A rank at the boss node.
B107.label: B107
B107.title: 補給線の安全を確保せよ！

B108.detail_en:
8th Destroyer Division Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of the "8th Destroyer Division" and deploy them Waters outside the Nansei Islands to the Naval District Waters and the Bashi Islands in the Nansei Island Waters. Capture the main enemy fleet in each of these waters and destroy them
* Sortie a Fleet consisting of [[Asashio]], [[Arashio]], [[Ooshio]], and [[Michishio]] and 2XX to 1-2 and 2-2 and score an S-rank on the boss nodes.
B108.label: B108
B108.title: 「第八駆逐隊」、南西へ！
B108.title_en: 8th Destroyer Division, to the South West

B109.detail_en:
8th Destroyer Division: Organize a fleet consisting of the Elite Members of the "8th Destroyer Division" as the main force of your fleet and deploy to the Kis Islands in the Northern Waters and then to the Salmon Waters in the Southern Waters. Completely eliminate the main enemy fleet in each of these locations with the power of the 8th Destroyer Division
* Sortie a Fleet consisting of consisting of [[Asashio|Asashio Kai Ni]], [[Arashio|Arashio Kai Ni]], [[Ooshio|Ooshio Kai Ni]], and [[Michishio|Michishio Kai Ni]] and 2XX to 3-2 and 5-4 and score an S-rank on the boss nodes.
B109.label: B109
B109.note: Special Lines plays upon the completion of the quest.
B109.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 22 Surface Radar|qty=2}}
B109.title: 最精鋭「第八駆逐隊」、全力出撃！
B109.title_en: Most Elite 8th Destroyer Division, All-out Sortie!

B11.detail_en:
''Deploy the newly formed "Mikawa Fleet"!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Choukai]], [[Aoba]], [[Kako]], [[Furutaka]], [[Tenryuu]], plus one additional [[Ship list|FAST]] ship.
*Completion Condition: Send the fleet on a sortie.
B11.label: B11
B11.title: 「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！

B110.detail_en:
Northern Sea combat patrol mission: Send an elite fleet with a light aircraft carrier, a seaplane tender as well as a light cruiser as its core force to the northern AL area.
Have it provide several combat patrols in order to engage and destroy the main enemy reinforcement unit and secure the northern sea front!
* Sortie a Fleet consisting of 1 CVL, 1 AV, 1CL and 3XX to 3-5 and score an S-rank on the boss node twice.
B110.label: B110
B110.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Present Box}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Shiden Kai 2|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Aerial Armament Material}}
B110.title: 北方海域戦闘哨戒を実施せよ！
B110.title_en: Provide combat patrols to the Arctic Waters!

B111.detail_en:
In order to strengthen the defense line, organize a fleet with Tatsuta Kai Ni or Tatsuta Kai as the flagship along with 3 or more Destroyers or Destroyer Escorts to form a transport fleet and conduct a sortie through the Nansei Island Defense Line, and the route nearby the naval base and successfully complete them multiple times. 
*Assemble a fleet consisting of  [[Tatsuta|Tatsuta Kai]] or [[Tatsuta|Tatsuta Kai Ni]] as flagship and 3 or more DD/DE and successfully complete 1-4 and 1-6 2 times each.
B111.label: B111
B111.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Aerial Armament Material}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft}} {{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}}

B112.detail_en:
Assemble 4 ship from the "4th Torpedo Squadron" (4Sd) with Murasame as the flagship (and two other main ships in the fleet) and deploy into the Southern Waters. Proceed to go into the Southern Water Front Lines, Sav Island Sea Area, and the Salmon Sea area, and proceed to crush the enemy fleets in the same area.
* Assemble a fleet consisting of [[Murasame|Murasame Kai Ni]] as flagship along with 3 of the following ships [[Yura|Yura Kai Ni]], [[Yuudachi|Yuudachi Kai Ni]], [[Harusame|Harusame Kai]], [[Samidare|Samidare Kai]] or [[Akizuki|Akizuki Kai]] and 2 XX in the fleet. Then take the fleet to 5-1, 5-3, and 5-4 and score an A rank at each boss node.
B112.label: B112
B112.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 22 Surface Radar|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai 2|qty=2}}

{{QuestRewardEquip|Underway Replenishment|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Drum Canister (Transport Use)|qty=3}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}}
B112.title: 精鋭「四水戦」、南方海域に展開せよ！
B112.title_en: Elite "4th Torpedo Squadron", expand into the Southern Waters!

B113.detail_en:
Organize an escort fleet led by a Light Cruiser or Destroyer class flagship, supported by at least three Destroyer or Escort class ships, for the sake of further strengthening of the Nansei Islands Defensive Line as well as securing the sea routes adjacent to the Naval Base.
*Assemble a fleet of 1 CL or DD flagship and 3 or more DD/DE and successfully complete / score an A rank or higher on the boss node 1-4 and 1-6 3 time on each map.
B113.label: B113
B113.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=3}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}}

B114.detail_en:
Reform the Fourth Carrier Division comprised of Aviation Battleships Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai, as well as Light Cruiser Ooyodo Kai and at least one Destroyer. Conduct combat patrols around the sea routes adjacent to the Naval Base, off Okinoshima Island (in the Okinoshima Sea) and in the Northern AL Waters. Engage in operations around the Curry Ocean Ri-Lanka Island.
*Assemble a fleet of [[Ise|Ise Kai]], [[Hyuuga|Hyuuga Kai]], [[Ooyodo|Ooyodo Kai]], 1DD and 2 XX and complete / score an A rank or higher on the boss nodes 1-6 and 2-5, 3-5, and 4-5.

B114.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher Kai Ni}}

B114.title_en: Reformed CarDiv4, sortie at full might!

B115.detail_en:
Form a fleet which includes an elite destroyer division that consists of 4 destroyers with adequate equipment and experience.
Send it to the sea route near the naval base, the Eastern Orel Bay, the Northern Kis Sea, the Western Curry Sea, and have it complete their mission at each front!
*Organize a Fleet of 4 DD and 2 XX and reach the base node / score an A Rank at the boss nodes of 1-6, 2-3, 3-2 and 4-2.
B115.label: B115
B115.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}} {{QuestRewardItem|Medal}}

B116.detail_en:
Deploy the elite "18th Destroyer Division" and carry out the Kis Island Evacuation Operation in the Northern Waters! Achieve repeated and decisive victories at the Kis Islands!
* Organize a fleet with [[Arare|Arare Kai Ni]], [[Kasumi|Kasumi Kai Ni /Kai Ni B]], [[Kagerou|Kagerou Kai]] and [[Shiranui|Shiranui Kai]] and 2 XX, go to 3-2 and score an S rank(?) 2 times.

{{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft}} {{QuestRewardEquip|10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Additional Machine Guns}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=5}}

B116.title_en: Destroy Division 18, onward to the Northern Waters' Kis Island!

B117.detail_en:
Send a full fleet with either Kuroshio Kai 2, Shiranui Kai 2 or Kagerou Kai 2 as flagship and two other Lv.75+ Type-A Destroyers to the Western Curry Sea, the Northern Kis Island, The Southern Sav Island multiple times and have it successfully complete each operation!

* Organize a fleet with [[Kagerou|Kagerou Kai Ni]], [[Shiranui|Shiranui Kai Ni]] or [[Kuroshio|Kuroshio Kai Ni]] as flagship and 2 more Kagerou-class / Yuugumo-class DDs that are Level 75+ and 3 XX and successfully score 2 S Rank victories at the boss nodes of 3-2, 4-2, and 5-3.
B117.label: B117
B117.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}}

{{QuestRewardItem|Medal|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Prototype Flight Deck Catapult}} {{QuestRewardEquip|12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai 2}}

B117.title_en: Elite Type-A Destroyers, Charging Through Enemy Territory!

B118.detail_en:
Form a carrier-focused strike fleet with Ise Kai 2, the lead ship of the remodelled aviation battleships (battle carriers), as flagship and core of the fleet, send it to the Northern AL Sea Combat Patrols,  Ri Lanka in the Curry Sea as well as Peacock Island, and annihilate the enemy!

*Organize a fleet with [[Ise|Ise Kai Ni]] as flagship and score an S rank at the boss nodes of 3-5, 4-5, and 6-4.

B119.detail_en:
Deploy a fleet with the flagship Ise K2 and two escort destroyers at its core to intercept the enemy carrier task force at the KW Atoll!
Sortie there multiple times in order to intercept and completely annihilate the incoming enemy task force!
Ise K2, set sail!
*Organize a fleet with [[Ise|Ise Kai Ni]] as flagship, 2 DD and 3 XX and score 3 S ranks at the boss node of 6-5.

B12.detail_en:
''Deploy the 6th Destroyer Division consist of "Akatsuki", "Hibiki", "Ikazuchi", and "Inazuma".''
*Fleet Requirement: '''ONLY''' [[Akatsuki]], [[Hibiki]] (Верный is OK), [[Inazuma]], and [[Ikazuchi]].
*Completion Condition: Send the fleet on a sortie.

Make a fleet consisting of the "18 Cruiser Division" along with 2 Destroyers and complete the following operations at the Nansei Island Offshore Area, the Nansei Island Defense Line, the waters off the coast of the Naval Base, and the Waters along the seaside route near the naval base

* Organize a fleet consisting of [[Tenryuu|Tenryuu Kai Ni]], [[Tatsuta|Tatsuta Kai Ni]], 2 DD, 2 XX and successfully get an A rank(?) victory at 1-2, 1-4, 1-5, and complete 1-6.

B121.detail_en:
Organize the powerful fleet consisting of the first platoon of the 17th Destroyer division consisting of [[Shiratsuyu|Shiratsuyu Kai Ni]] and [[Shigure|Shigure Kai Ni]] then proceed to the Eastern Orel Sea, Jam Island Operation, Northern Salmon Sea Area, and Offshore the KW Atoll area and destroy the enemy!
* Take a fleet consisting of [[Shiratsuyu|Shiratsuyu Kai Ni]] and [[Shigure|Shigure Kai Ni]] and score an S rank at 2-3, 4-1, 5-5, and 6-5.

B121.title_en: First Platoon of the Elite 17th Destroyer Division, sortie!

B122.detail_en:
Organize the powerful fleet consisting of the second platoon of the 4th Cruiser division consisting of [[Maya|Maya Kai Ni]] and [[Choukai|Choukai Kai Ni]] then proceed to the Nansei Island Defense Line, Eastern Orel Sea, the Alfonsinoes, and the Curry Island Off Ri Lanka and destroy the enemy!
* Take a fleet consisting of [[Maya|Maya Kai Ni]] and [[Choukai|Choukai Kai Ni]] and score an S rank at 1-4, 2-3, 3-3, and 4-5.

B123.detail_en:
Sortie a fleet that includes the 4 ships of DesDiv 17, namely the remodelled Type-A Destroyers, Isokaze B Kai, Hamakaze B Kai, Urakaze D Kai & Tanikaze D Kai, to the sea area near the naval base, Kis Island, the Brunei Anchorage, the forefront of the southern sea, and engage and destroy the enemy forces there!
* Take a fleet consisting of [[Isokaze|Isokaze B Kai]], [[Hamakaze|Hamakaze B Kai]], [[Urakaze|Urakaze D Kai]], [[Tanikaze|Tanikaze D Kai]] and 2 XX and sortie to 1-5, 3-2, 7-1 and 5-1 and score an S rank on the boss nodes

B124.detail_en:
Form a powerful fleet that includes at least 2 ships of DesDiv 7, which consists of Oboro, Ushio, Akebono & Sazanami, annihilate the enemy forces at the Nansei Islands Coastal Waters, the Bashi Island Strait, the Eastern Orel Bay, the Okinoshima Sea, and secure our control of the Nansei Islands area!

B124.title_en: DesDiv 7, advance to the Nansei Islands!

Form a fleet that includes a CL as flagship and either 2 DD or 2 DE, then have it patrol the sea around the Nansei Islands, the Coastal Refinery Zone, the Nansei Islands Defence Line, the Nansei Islands Coastal Waters and the Bashi Island Strait, and engage and destroy any enemy fleets in order to establish control of the coastal waters!

Type- A Destroyer Formation Mission: Deploy a powerful fleet that includes the elite DesDiv 10 consisting of the two Yuugumo-class destroyers Yuugumo K2 & Makigumo K2 to the southern sea, then have it engage and destroy the enemies at Sav Island, the Salmon Sea area and the northern Salmon Sea area!

* Take a fleet consisting of [[Makigumo|Makigumo Kai Ni]] and [[Yuugumo|Yuugumo Kai Ni]] and 4 XX and score an S rank on the boss nodes of 5-3, 5-4, and 5-5.

Organize a Fleet with a Light Cruiser as Flagship and sorting into the Moray Sea (3-1), The Alfonsinoes (3-3), The Northern Water Front Lines (3-4) and the Operation AL Sea Area (3-5) multiple times. Successfully eliminate the enemy forces in the areas and take control of the Northern Waters!

B128.detail_en:
Southern Sea Hiei Sortie Mission: Sortie a powerful fleet with fast battleship "Hiei" as flagship to Sav Island in the southern sea as well as the Salmon Sea area. Engage the enemy forces in those areas and annihilate them!

* Organize a fleet with [[Hiei]] as your flagship, go to 5-3 and 5-4 and score an S rank on the boss nodes

B129.detail_en:
Organize your first fleet with the elite battleships, Nagato Kai Ni and Mutsu Kai Ni as part of your fleet and proceed to the Bashi Islands, the AL Operation Area, the Curry Ocean off from Ri Lanka, and the Southern Water Frontlines! Capture and destroy the main enemy fleets in the area!

*Organize a fleet with Nagato Kai Ni, Mutsu Kai Ni and 4XX in your first fleet and score an S rank at 2-2,3-5,4-5,5-1 and score an S rank on each.
B129.label: B129
B129.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|41cm Twin Gun Mount|qty=4}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 91 Armor Piercing Shell|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 3 Shell|qty=2}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Prototype 46cm Twin Gun Mount}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Prototype Nanzan}}
B129.title: 精鋭無比「第一艦隊」まかり通る！

B13.detail_en:
''Eliminate the enemy fleet at the sea around Bashi Island with the 4th Squadron consisting "Atago", "Takao", "Choukai", and "Maya"!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Atago]], [[Takao]], [[Choukai]], and [[Maya]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]].
B13.label: B13
B13.title: 「第四戦隊」出撃せよ！

B130.detail_en:
Organize your first fleet with the elite battleships, Nagato Kai Ni and Mutsu Kai Ni as part of your fleet and proceed to the Nansei Island Waters to patrol off of Okinoshima, the Southern Waters in the Eastern Salmon Sea, and the Central Waters at Peacock Island Capture Operation! Capture and destroy the main enemy fleets in the area!

*Organize a fleet with [[Nagato|Nagato Kai Ni]], [[Mutsu|Mutsu Kai Ni]] and 4XX in your first fleet and score an S rank at 2-5,5-5, and 6-4 and score an S rank on each.
B130.label: B130
B130.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardEquip|41cm Twin Gun Mount Kai Ni}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=5}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Prototype 46cm Twin Gun Mount}}
B130.title: 精鋭無比「第一艦隊」まかり通る！【拡張作戦】

B131.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of 2 Aviation Battleships as the main part of the fleet. Then sortie them to the Nansei Island Defense Line, The Waters Adjacent to the Naval Base Waters, Eastern Orel Sea, and Off the Coast of Tawi-Tawi. Engage the main enemy fleet and destroy them!
*Organize a fleet 2 BBV and 4XX in your first fleet and score an S rank at 1-4,1-5,2-3, and 7-2.
B131.label: B131
B131.title: 航空戦艦戦隊、戦闘哨戒！
B131.title_en: Aviation Battleship Squadron! Commence Combat Patrol

B132.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of Ise Kai Ni and Hyuuga Kai Ni to form the Super Elite 4th Carrier Division in the first fleet. Then sortie them to the waters ajacent to the Naval Base and complete the operation multiple times, and go to the Ri Lanaka off from the Curry Ocean, the Eastern Salmon Sea, and the KW Atoll and elminiate the enemy fleet in the area!
*Organize a fleet with [[Ise|Ise Kai Ni]] and [[Hyuuga|Hyuuga Kai Ni]] and 4XX in your first fleet and score an S rank at 4-5, 5-5, and 6-5 of the boss node once and also successfully reaching the base node of 1-6 multiple times.
B132.label: B132
B132.title: 最精鋭「第四航空戦隊」、出撃せよ！
B132.title_en: Super Elite 4th Carrier Division, Weigh Anchor!

B133.detail_en:
Southern Sea Sortie Mission: Repeatedly send a fleet with Kongō K2C as flagship with another Kongō-class ship as well as at least two destroyers as escorts to the Forefront of the Southern Sea, Sav Island, the Salmon Sea Area, the Northern Salmon Sea Area, and annihilate any enemies in these areas!
*Organize a fleet with [[Kongou|Kongou Kai Ni C]], 1 other Kongou-Class FBB, 2DD and 2XX in your first fleet and score an S rank 2 times at 5-1, 5-3, 5-4 and 5-5.
B133.label: B133
B133.note: Fuel supply number is a reference to the year of Kongou's sinking
B133.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardEquip|35.6cm Twin Gun Mount Kai Ni}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Medal}}
B133.title: 重改装高速戦艦「金剛改二丙」、南方突入！
B133.title_en: Heavily Refurbished Fast Battleship "Kongō K2C", Head to the South!

B134.detail_en:
Fleet Headquarters Improvements: Form a fleet that includes Ooyodo as flagship and either Akashi or a seaplane tender, then repeatedly send it to the Eastern Orel Bay, the Alfonsinoes, the Western Jam Island Sea in order to engage and destroy the enemy fleets!
*Organize a fleet with Ooyodo as flagship along with 1 AV or Akashi and 4XX in your first fleet and score an S rank at 2-3, 3-3, and 4-1 twice.
B134.label: B134
B134.title: 艦隊司令部の強化 【実施段階】

B135.detail_en:
Patrol Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of 1 Light Cruiser Class along with 3 or more Destroyers in your fleet, then proceed to sortie into the Naval District Waters to the Nansei Island Area, The Coastal Refinery area, the Nansei Island Coastal Area and the Bashi Islands in the Nansei Island Waters. Proceed to encounter and destroy the enemy!
*Organize a fleet consisting of 1 CL/CT/CLT, 3 DD/DE and 2 XX and S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 2-1 and 2-2.
B135.label: B135
B135.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Development Material|qty=3}} {{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=3}} {{QuestRewardEquip|25mm Triple Autocannon Mount|qty=2}}
B135.title: (近海哨戒を実施せよ！

B136.detail_en:
"DesDiv 24" Mission: Form a fleet that includes [[Umikaze|Umikaze Kai Ni]] as flagship along with two members consisting of [[Kawakaze]], [[Yamakaze]] and/or [[Suzukaze]], then send them to the Eastern Orel Bay, Okinoshima Island, The Forefront of Southern Sea, and the Sav Islands. Take control of the waters and destroy the enemy!
*Organize a fleet with [[Umikaze|Umikaze Kai Ni]] as flaship + 2 DD consisting of [[Kawakaze]], [[Yamakaze]] and/or [[Suzukaze]] and 3 XX, then go and S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 2-4, 5-1, and 5-3
B136.label: B136

{{QuestRewardEquip|12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2}}

{{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 13 Air Radar|qty=3}} {{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}}

B137.detail_en:
First Carrier Division Mission: Organize a Fleet consisting of [[Akagi|Akagi Kai Ni/E]] as Flagship and [[Kaga]] as the 2nd ship to form the center of the 1st Carrier Division. Then Deploy the fleet to the Curry Ocean off Ri Lanka, the Water off of the Coral Sea, and in addition, conduct repeated strikes in the water off of the KW Atoll. First Carrier Division, Destroy the Enemy Fleets!
*Organize a fleet with [[Akagi|Akagi Kai Ni/E]] as flagship along with [[Kaga]] in the 2nd slot and 4 XX, score an S rank at 4-5 and 5-2 once, and S rank on 6-5 twice.
B137.label: B137
B137.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardEquip|Ryuusei Kai (CarDiv 1)}}
'''Then choose between:'''

B138.detail_en:
Patrol Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of Haguro and Kamikaze as the main force along with either 1 Heavy Cruiser and 2 Destroyers or 4 Destroyers in your fleet, then proceed to sortie into the Nansei Island Coastal Area, the Bashi Islands, and the Eastern Orel Sea Area. Proceed to engage and destroy the enemy!
*Organize a fleet consisting of either [[Haguro]] and [[Kamikaze]] along with 1 CA(V) and 2 DD (total of 5 ships) '''or''' [[Haguro]] and [[Kamikaze]] along with 4 DD and S rank the boss nodes of 2-1, 2-2, and 2-3.

{{QuestRewardItem|New Model Aerial Armament Material}} {{QuestRewardItem|Reinforcement Expansion}} {{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}}

B139.detail_en:
Research of Ship-borne Land Based Equipment in Actual Combat: Organize a fleet that includes 1 Seaplane Tender or Landing Ship in your fleet to fight the enemy forces and defeat them multiple times in Waters off of Curry, Waters towards Ri Lanka and the Central Northern Offshore Sea of Peacock Island!
*Organize a fleet consisting 1 AV or LHA and 5 XX and score an A rank at the boss nodes of 4-5, and 6-4 twice.
B139.label: B139
B139.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Type 2 12cm Mortar Kai|qty=3}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Shipborne Model Type 4 20cm Anti-ground Rocket Launcher}}

B139.title_en: Research of Ship-borne Land Based Equipment in Actual Combat

''Eliminate the enemy fleet at the Orel Sea with the Nishimura Fleet consisting "Fusou", "Yamashiro", "Mogami", and "Shigure"!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Fusou]], [[Yamashiro]], [[Mogami]], and [[Shigure]]. You may add additional ships. 
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].

B14.title: 「西村艦隊」出撃せよ！

Deploy a fleet with the remodeled experimental light cruiser Yuubari as flagship and deploy to the Nansei Island waters in the coast off Okinoshima, the Northern Waters of the Alfonsinoes, the Southern Waters off Sav Islands, and the Central Waters of the Guano Atoll! Seek out and destroy the main enemy fleets within the area.
* Organize a fleet with [[Yuubari|Yuubari Kai Ni]] (or D /Toku) as flagship and 5 XX, then score an S rank on 2-5, 3-3, 5-3 and 6-3.

Organize a Fleet consisting of 4 or more 6th torpedo Squadron members consisting of Yuubari Kai Ni as flagship and proceed into the Shore outside of the Naval District Waters, the Sea Routes outside the Naval Base Waters, Bashi Islands in the Nansei Island Waters, Kis Islands in the Northern Waters, and the sea around Brunei Strait in the South Western Waters. Proceed to successfully complete the operation in each area once!

Sortie a fleet containing the reorganized 31st Destroyer Division consisting of Yuugumo-class destroyers Naganami, Kishinami, Asashimo and Okinami Kai Ni. Deploy to Coastal Refinery Zone, Nansei Islands Defense Line, Seas Near the Naval Base, Bashi Strait, Eastern Orel Bay and destroy the enemy!

Organize the 5th Carrier Division mobile task force fleet consisting mainly of the carriers Shoukaku and Zuikaku, along with the escort Destroyer Oboro and Akigumo. With said fleet, sortie into the Northern AL Area, Off the Coral Sea, Off the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage area, and the Off the KW Atoll. Locate the main enemy fleet and destroy them.

Organize fleet consisting of 2 Kongou-class fast battleships including Hiei Kai Ni C, along with 1 light cruiser, and 1 or more destroyers. With said fleet, sortie into the Northern Waters Front Lines, Coral Sea Area, Sav Islands, Salmon Sea Area, and the waters north of it. Locate the main enemy fleet and destroy them.

Have Gotland Andra as your flagship, along with 1 or more destroyers in your fleet. With said fleet, proceed into the water off of Okinoshima in the Nansei Islands, Furthermore, proceed into the Central Waters off the coast of Guano, the central area around Peacock Island, and the KW Atoll. Locate the main enemy fleet and destroy them.
* Organize a fleet with [[Gotland|Gotland Andra]] as flagship, 1 DD, and 4 XX, then score an S rank on the boss nodes of 2-5, 6-3, 6-4, and 6-5.

Organize a fleet consisting of 2 US ships as part of the main part of the fleet. Perform a patrol in the Nansei Island Waters area as Bashi Island, Eastern Orel Sea and the Okinoshima Islands. Within each of the operation areas, search for the main enemy fleet and destroy them!

Organize a fleet with Fletcher Kai Mod 2 as your flagship, along with 2 American, British, Australian or Dutch ships as part of the fleet. Organize a fleet with Fletcher Mk.II as your flagship, along with 2 American, British, Australian or Dutch ships as part of the fleet. Then proceed into the Waters adjacent to the Naval District, Brunei Anchorage, MS Islands, and the KW Atoll. Confront the main enemy fleet in the area and destroy them.

''Eliminate the enemy fleet at the Moray Sea in the Northern Sea Region with the 5th Carrier Fleet consisting "Shoukaku" and "Zuikaku"!''

Organize a fleet with Fletcher Mk.II, along with 3 American, British, Australian or Dutch ships as part of the fleet. Then proceed into the Curry Ocean near the coast of Ri-Lanka, The Northern Salmon Sea Area, and the Central Water off of Peacock Islands. Destroy the main enemy fleets!

Organize a fleet with 1 American or British born carrier among the fleet. Then proceed into the Western Water of Ri-Lanka, the whole Northern Water battle, the Southern Waters Coral Sea Area, and the South Western Waters of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage in the deepest area. Confront the main enemy fleet in the area and destroy them.

Special Aircraft Carrier Mission: Organize a carrier task force with an efficient air squadron that has two or more strong regular aircraft carriers as the core part of the fleet. Sortie to the Nansei Islands Offshore Okinoshima area, Off the Coast of Okinoshima Island, and on the Western Waters Coast of Ri Lanka Island! Destroy enemy forces with all you got!

Organize a fleet with Kaga Kai Ni as your flagship, along with 1 or more carriers making up part of the fleet. Then proceed into the Western Waters off the coast of Casgadama, Off the coast of Ri Lanka within the Curry Ocean area, the whole Northern Waters Battle, and the Southern Waters in the Coral Sea area. With a fleet of 5 or less ships, organize Haguro as flagship and sortie into the Malacca Strait in the South Western Waters! Destroy the enemy destroyer fleets in the Penang Island Sea multiple times. Strong heavy cruiser Haguro, sortie!
