B155.title_en: Heavy Cruiser "Haguro", Sortie! Battle of the Malacca Strait

B156.detail_en:
Form a fleet using Taigei or Jingei as flagship and have 2 Submarines as part of the fleet. Then with your fleet, patrol the Offshore Nansei Islands, the Oil Refinery Area, Nansei Islands Coastal Waters and the Eastern Orel Sea area. Take control of the seas within each of these locations!
* Organize a fleet consisting of [[Taigei]] or [[Jingei]] as flagship along with 2 SS/SSV and 3 XX and score an A rank(?) at the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 2-1, and 2-3.
B156.label: B156
B156.reward_other:
Furniture: ''Whale Hanging Scroll''
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|New Model Armament Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Late Model Bow Torpedo Mount (6 tubes)|stars=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}}
B156.title: 静かな海を護る「鯨」、動き出す！
B156.title_en: And thus the whale stirs to protect the calm sea!

B157.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of the powerful 10th Destroyer Division as part of your fleet and then proceed to deploy into the Nansei Island Defense Line, Bashi Island, Kis Island, Jam Island, and deep in the area offshore of Penang Island of the Malacca Strait.
* Organize a fleet consisting of [[Yuugumo|Yuugumo Kai Ni]], [[Makigumo|Makigumo Kai Ni]], [[Kazagumo|Kazagumo Kai Ni]], and [[Akigumo|Akigumo Kai Ni]] and 2 XX and score an S rank(?) at the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-2, 3-2, 4-1, and 7-3 (Part 2)
B157.label: B157
B157.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardEquip|61cm Quadruple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount Late Model|stars=5}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Development Material|qty=10}} {{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=5}}
B157.title: 主力オブ主力、縦横無尽ッ！
B157.title_en: Main Force of the Main Force, go wild!

B158.detail_en:
Special mission of the 27th Destroyer Division: Organize a fleet consisting of the remodeled destroyers of the 27th Destroyer Division, Shiratsuyu Kai Ni and Shigure Kai Ni, as part of your fleet. And then proceed to sortie into the Seas Near the Naval District, Off the waters of Okinoshima Island, Offshore of Brunei Anchorage, North of the Salmon Sea Area, and along the Guano Atoll area. Destroy the main enemy fleet.
* Organize a fleet consisting of [[Shiratsuyu|Shiratsuyu Kai Ni]], and [[Shigure|Shigure Kai Ni]], and 4 XX and score an S rank at the boss nodes of 1-5, 2-5 7-1, 5-5, and 6-3
B158.label: B158
B158.reward_other:
Furniture: ''"Time for Baked Potatoes and Reading" Table''
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Underway Replenishment|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Emergency Repair Goddess}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Canned Saury|qty=2}}
B158.title: 精鋭「二七駆」、回避運動は気をつけて！
B158.title_en: Elite "DesDiv 27", be careful during evasive maneuvers!

B159.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of either [[Ooyodo]] or [[Yukikaze|Tan Yang]] as the flagship and at least 3 or more destroyers or coastal defense ships within the fleet. Then sortie into the Oil Refinery Area, Nansei Island Defense Line, the seas near the Nansei Islands and Bashi Island multiple times. Defend the seas!
*Have [[Ooyodo]] or [[Yukikaze|Tan Yang]] as the flagship and up to 3 DD/DE in total and 2 XX and score an S rank at the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, 2-1, and 2-2 twice.
B159.label: B159
B159.note: [[Yukikaze|Tan Yang]] only, [[Yukikaze|Yukikaze Kai Ni]] will not work for this quest
B159.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Headquarters Personnel}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Emergency Repair Goddess}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Armament Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Underway Replenishment|qty=2}}
B159.title: 【艦隊司令部強化】艦隊旗艦、出撃せよ！

B16.detail_en:
''With the completely re-formed "Mikawa Fleet", eliminate the enemies at the Orel Sea!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Choukai]], [[Aoba]], [[Kinugasa]], [[Kako]], [[Furutaka]], and [[Tenryuu]].
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B16.label: B16
B16.title: 新「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！

B160.detail_en:
Organize a powerful fleet consisting of either [[Yukikaze|Tan Yang]] or [[Yukikaze|Yukikaze Kai Ni]] as the flagship and deploy into the Eastern Orel Sea, Okinoshima Waters, Off the Coast of Okinoshima Waters, The Alfonsinoes area, and the deepest parts of the Penang Island in the strait of Malacca multiple times. Capture and destroy the main enemy fleet in the areas.
*Have [[Yukikaze|Tan Yang]] or [[Yukikaze|Yukikaze Kai Ni]] as the flagship along with 5 XX and score an S rank at the boss nodes of 2-3, 2-4, 2-5, 3-3, and 7-3 (Part 2).
B160.label: B160
B160.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Medal}} {{QuestRewardItem|Reinforcement Expansion}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Locally Modified 12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount|stars=4}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Locally Modified 10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount|stars=4}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Armament Material|qty=2}}
B160.title: 奇跡の駆逐艦「雪風」、再び出撃す！
B160.title_en: Miraculous Destroyer Yukikaze, sorties once again!

B161.detail_en:
Organize a fleet with Yukikaze Kai Ni and Shigure Kai Ni as the core part of the fleet. Then deploy into the water along the Sav Islands, North of the Salmon Sea Area, the Curry Ocean near Ri Lanka Island, the Central Water along Peacock Island, and the KW Atoll.
*Have [[Shigure|Shigure Kai Ni]] and [[Yukikaze|Yukikaze Kai Ni]] and 4 XX score an S rank at the boss nodes of 4-5, 5-3, 5-5, 6-4, and 6-5
B161.label: B161
B161.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=6}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|5inch Single Gun Mount Mk.30 Kai|stars=4}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 22 Surface Radar Kai 4 (Calibrated Late Model)|stars=4}} {{QuestRewardEquip|61cm Quadruple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount Late Model|stars=4}}
B161.title: 最精強！「呉の雪風」「佐世保の時雨」
B161.title_en: Unmatched! Yukikaze of Kure & Shigure of Sasebo

B162.detail_en:
Organize a fleet, then sortie into the Moray Sea, the Kis Island, the Alfonsinoes, the entire Northern Water area, and the Northern Operation AL area. With your fleet, take control of the North Sea area!
* Sortie a fleet into 3-1, 3-2, 3-3, 3-4 and 3-5 and score an A+ rank at the boss node.
B162.label: B162
B162.reward_other:
Furniture: 2020 Naval Base Fireplace x1
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=5}} {{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}}
B162.title: 北の海から愛をこめて
B162.title_en: From the Northern Seas with Love

B163.detail_en:
Organize a fleet with Kuma Kai Ni / D in your fleet as flagship and sortie into the Naval district Sea route, Bashi Island Sea in the Nansei Island Sea, Kis Islands in the Northern Sea, the deepest parts of the Malacca Strait outside of Penang Island in the Southwestern Sea. Complete all operations and destroy the main enemy fleets within each area.

*Organize a fleet consists of [[Kuma|Kuma Kai Ni]]/[[Kuma|Kuma Kai Ni D]] as flagship and 5XX to S rank 2-2, 3-2, 7-3 (Part 2), and Reach Node N on 1-6
B163.label: B163
B163.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Reinforcement Expansion}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|25mm Triple Autocannon Mount|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=3}}
B163.title: 球磨型軽巡一番艦、出撃だクマ!
B163.title_en: Kuma-class Light Cruiser name ship, beary eager to sortie!

B164.detail_en:
Organize a fleet with Noshiro Kai Ni along with 3 destroyers under her command and sortie into the Okinoshima Area, Kis Island, Sav Islands, Brunei Anchorage, and deep within the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage. Capture and destroy the main enemy fleet.

*Organize a fleet consists of [[Noshiro|Noshiro Kai Ni]], 3 DD and 2 XX in your fleet and score an S rank at the boss nodes on 2-4, 3-2, 5-3, 7-1, and 7-2 (Part 2)
B164.label: B164
B164.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardEquip|15.2cm Twin Gun Mount Kai Ni}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|15.2cm Twin Gun Mount|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|8cm High-angle Gun|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|25mm Triple Autocannon Mount|qty=2}}
B164.title: 改装最新鋭軽巡「能代改二」、出撃せよ！
B164.title_en: Remodeled State of the Art Light Cruiser Noshiro Kai Ni, Sortie!

B165.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consist the DesDiv 7 Members [[Akebono|Akebono Kai Ni]] and [[Ushio|Ushio Kai Ni]] then sortie into Nansei Island East Orel Sea, Northern Sea's Kis Islands, Western Sea's Casgadama, and the Southern Sea's Salmon Sea Area. Confront the main enemy fleets and destroy them

*Organize a fleet consists of [[Akebono|Akebono Kai Ni]],[[Ushio|Ushio Kai Ni]], and 4 XX in your fleet and score an S rank at the boss nodes on 2-3, 3-2, 4-4, 5-4
B165.label: B165
B165.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardEquip|12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai 2}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Reinforcement Expansion|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Bomb-carrying Type 1 Fighter Hayabusa Model III Kai (65th Squadron)}}
B165.title: 精鋭「第七駆逐隊」、出撃せよ！

B166.detail_en:
Organize a fleet with [[Mogami Kai Ni]] or [[Mogami Kai Ni Toku]] as flagship. Sortie to the Bashi Island Strait, the Okinoshima Island, the Curry Ocean Ri-Lanka Island and the Forefront of the Southern Sea areas, and destroy the enemy forces!

* Sortie a fleet with [[Mogami Kai Ni]] or [[Mogami Kai Ni Toku]] as flagship plus 5 XX and score a S-Rank victory at the boss nodes on 2-2, 2-4, 4-5 and 5-1.
B166.label: B166
B166.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Medal}}{{QuestRewardItem|Development Material|qty=8}}{{QuestRewardEquip|Zuiun Model 12|qty=2}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy|}}{{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Mamiya}}{{QuestRewardItem|Skilled Crew Member}}
B166.title: 改装航空巡洋艦「最上」、抜錨せよ！

B167.detail_en:
Organize a fleet with [[Mogami Kai Ni]] or [[Mogami Kai Ni Toku]] as flagship, plus any two Nishimura Fleet DDs. Sortie to the Eastern Orel Bay, the Peacock Island, the deep parts of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage and the deep parts of Penang Island. Crush the enemy fleets!

* Sortie a fleet with [[Mogami Kai Ni]] or [[Mogami Kai Ni Toku]] as flagship, plus 2 Nishimura Fleet DDs and 3 XX and score a S-Rank victory at the boss nodes on 2-3, 6-4, 7-2-2, 7-3-2.
* Nishimura Fleet DDs include [[Michishio]], [[Shigure]], [[Asagumo]] and [[Yamagumo]].
B167.label: B167
B167.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|8cm High-angle Gun Kai + Additional Machine Guns|link=8cm Twin High-angle Mount + Additional Machine Guns}}{{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}}{{QuestRewardItem|Emergency Repair Goddess|qty=2}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Medal|qty=2}}{{QuestRewardEquip|Type C Kouhyouteki|qty=2}}{{QuestRewardEquip|Kyoufuu Kai}}
B167.title: 西村艦隊、精鋭先行掃討隊、前進せよ！
B167.title_en: Elite Vanguard Squadron, Nishimura Fleet, Forward!

B168.detail_en:
Organize a fleet with [[Yahagi Kai Ni]] or [[Yahagi Kai Ni B]] as flagship, plus 2 DD and 3 XX. Sortie to the Nansei Islands, the Okinoshima Sea, the Sav Island and the Northern Solomon Sea Area. Destroy all abyssal forces!

* Sortie a fleet with [[Yahagi Kai Ni]] or [[Yahagi Kai Ni B]] as flagship, plus 2 DD and 3 XX and score a S-Rank victory at the boss nodes on 1-4, 2-5, 5-3 and 5-5.
B168.label: B168
B168.reward_other:
'''Furniture: Yahagi's Wall Hanging Scroll'''

{{QuestRewardEquip|15.2cm Twin Gun Mount Kai Ni|stars=2}}
B168.title: 二水戦旗艦、この「矢矧」が預かります！

B169.detail_en:
Have [[Ryuuhou|Ryuuhou Kai Ni/E]] as the flagship along with [[Shigure Kai Ni]] in the first fleet. Sortie to the Nansei Islands area's Bashi Channel, the Eastern Orel Bay, the Okinoshima Islands, the Okinoshima Sea, and the deepest parts of the sea near the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage in the Southwestern Area. Engage and destroy any enemy fleets! 

* Sortie the first fleet with [[Ryuuhou|Ryuuhou Kai Ni/E]] as the flagship along with [[Shigure Kai Ni]] and 4 XX in the First fleet and score a S-Rank victory at the boss nodes on 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, 2-5, and 7-2-2.
B169.label: B169
B169.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=8}}{{QuestRewardEquip|Tenzan Model 12A}}{{QuestRewardEquip|Emergency Repair Goddess}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|8cm High-angle Gun Kai + Additional Machine Guns|stars=2}}{{QuestRewardEquip|Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber)|qty=2}}{{QuestRewardEquip|Tenzan Model 12A Kai (w/ Type 6 Airborne Radar Kai)}}
B169.title: 「新しき翼。改装航空母艦「龍鳳」、出撃せよ！
B169.title_en: New Wings, Remodeled Light Carrier Ryuuhou, Sortie!

B17.detail_en:
''With a fleet including 2 I-type submarines, eliminate the enemies at the Orel Sea!''
*Fleet Requirement: 2 [[Ship Class#Submarine .28SS.29|Submarines]] ([[Ship_Class#Submarine_Aircraft_Carrier_.28SSV.29|SSV]] is OK too). You may add additional ships.
:*Despite the quest description, [[Maruyu]] and [[U-511|U-511/Ro-500]] can satisfy the quest requirement as well.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B17.label: B17
B17.title: 「潜水艦隊」出撃せよ！

B18.detail_en:
''With a fleet using 2 aviation battleships and 2 aviation cruisers as basis, gain the sea control of Curry Ocean!''
*Fleet Requirement: 2 [[Ship Class#Aviation Battleship .28BBV.29|Aviation Battleships]] and 2 [[Ship Class#Aviation Cruiser .28CAV.29|Aviation Cruisers]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 4#4-2|World 4-2]].
B18.label: B18
B18.title: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！

B19.detail_en:
''Deploy the "6th Squadron" and gain "complete victory" by eliminating enemies at the Orel Sea!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Furutaka]], [[Kako]], [[Aoba]], and [[Kinugasa]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B19.label: B19
B19.title: 「第六戦隊」出撃せよ！

B2.detail_en:
''Deploy your fleet to the Sea in Front of Naval Base and prevent the enemy fleet from advancing!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 1#1-1|World 1-1]].
B2.label: B2
B2.title: 鎮守府正面海域を護れ！
B2.title_en: Protect the Sea in Front of Naval Base!

B20.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet containing the "8th Destroyer Division" and eliminate the enemies at the Orel Sea!''
*Fleet Requirement: Consists of [[Asashio]], [[Michishio]], [[Ooshio]], and [[Arashio]]. You may add additional ships. 
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B20.label: B20
B20.title: 「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B21.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet containing the "18th Destroyer Division" and eliminate the enemies at the Moray Sea!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Kasumi]], [[Arare]], [[Kagerou]], and [[Shiranui]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 3#3-1|World 3-1]].
B21.label: B21
B21.title: 「第十八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B22.detail_en:
''With a fleet containing the "30th Destroyer Division (1st. Gen), battle the main fleet at the sea near Kis Island!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Mutsuki]], [[Kisaragi]], [[Yayoi]], and [[Mochizuki]]. You may add additional [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|Destroyers]].
*Completion Condition: Obtain a C-rank or better result at the boss node of [[World 3#3-2|World 3-2]].
B22.label: B22
B22.title: 「第三十駆逐隊（第一次）」出撃せよ！

B23.detail_en:
''With a fleet using 2 aviation battleships as basis, defeat the enemy forces at the Casgadama Island in the Western Sea Region!''
*Fleet Requirement: 2 [[Ship Class#Aviation Battleship .28BBV.29|Aviation Battleships]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 4#4-4|World 4-4]].
B23.label: B23
B23.title: 「航空戦艦」抜錨せよ！

B24.detail_en:
''Weigh anchor, "30th Destroyer Division (2nd Gen.)"! Carry out anti-submarine patrol in front of the naval base!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Mutsuki]], [[Uzuki]], [[Yayoi]], and [[Mochizuki]]<ref name="moreshipsimpractical">Additional ships can be used, but the branching rules of the map makes it impossible to reach the boss with 5 or more ships. Thus for practical purposes it is limited to the 4 destroyers named in the quest.</ref>.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a C-rank or better result at the boss node of [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]].
B24.label: B24
B24.title: 「第三十駆逐隊」対潜哨戒！

B25.detail_en:
''With a fleet using the newly-formed "2nd Carrier Division" as basis, deploy to the sea near the Coral Islands and eliminate enemy mobile fleets!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Hiryuu#Second Upgrade|Hiryuu Kai Ni]] (as flagship), [[Souryuu]], and 2 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|Destroyers]]. You may add additional ships.
:*Souryuu's remodel tier does not matter.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 5#5-2|World 5-2]].
B25.label: B25
B25.title: 新編「第二航空戦隊」出撃せよ！

B26.detail_en:
''With a fleet having the re-formed "2nd Carrier Division" as basis, perform air raids at the enemy-held Ri Lanka Island and crush them!
*Fleet Requirement: [[Souryuu#Second Remodel|Souryuu Kai Ni]] as flagship, [[Hiryuu#Second Upgrade|Hiryuu Kai Ni]], and 2 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|Destroyers]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 4#4-3|World 4-3]].
B26.label: B26
B26.title: 精鋭「第二航空戦隊」抜錨せよ！

B27.detail_en:
''With a fleet having the twice-remodeled "Haruna Kai Ni" as basis, enter the "Southern Sea Region" and eliminate the enemy main forces!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Haruna#Second Upgrade|Haruna Kai Ni]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 5#5-1|World 5-1]].
B27.label: B27
B27.title: 戦艦「榛名」出撃せよ！

B28.detail_en:
''Deploy a mobile fleet including the Unryuu-class Aircraft Carrier "Unryuu Kai" to the Coral Islands and eliminate the enemy mobile fleet!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Unryuu#Upgrade|Unryuu Kai]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 5#5-2|World 5-2]].
B28.label: B28
B28.title: 「第六〇一航空隊」出撃せよ！

B29.detail_en:
''With a fleet consisting of 1~2 light carriers, 1 light cruiser, and 3~4 destroyers, eliminate the enemy forces at the Cam Ranh Peninsula!''
*Fleet Requirement: 1-2 [[Ship Class#Light Aircraft Carrier .28CVL.29|Light Carriers]], exactly 1 [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|Light Cruiser]], 3-4 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|Destroyers]], and no ships from any other classes.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-1|World 2-1]].
B29.label: B29
B29.title: 「軽空母」戦隊、出撃せよ！

B3.detail_en:
''Deploy your newly formed "2nd Fleet"!
*Completion Condition: Send Fleet #2 on a sortie.
B3.label: B3
B3.title: 第2艦隊、出撃せよ！

B30.detail_en:
''With a light cruiser-led torpedo squadron (maximum of 2 light cruisers, rest destroyers), eliminate the enemies at the sea around Bashi Island!''
*Fleet Requirement: 1-2 [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|Light Cruisers]] (with 1 as flagship) and 4-5 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|Destroyers]], and no ships from any other classes.
**The minimum number of destroyers required is currently unknown.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]].
B30.label: B30
B30.title: 「水雷戦隊」バシー島沖緊急展開
B30.title_en: "Torpedo Squadron" Emergency Deployment to Sea Around Bashi Island

B31.detail_en:
''Send a fleet with "2nd Squadron" as basis to the Curry Ocean and eliminate enemy surface forces by repeated sorties!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Nagato]], [[Mutsu]], [[Fusou]], and [[Yamashiro]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory 2 times at the boss node of [[World 4#4-2|World 4-2]].
B31.label: B31
B31.title: 「第二戦隊」抜錨！

B32.detail_en:
''Charge into the Northern AL Sea Region with a fleet including 2 Battleships and 1 direct support light carrier (no regular carrier) and eliminate the enemies!''
*Fleet Requirement: Exactly 2 [[Ship Class#Battleship .28BB.29|Battleships]] and exactly 1 [[Ship Class#Light Aircraft Carrier .28CVL.29|Light Carrier]]. You may add additional ships.
**'''[[Ship Class#Aviation Battleship .28BBV.29|Aviation Battleships]] and [[Ship Class#Aircraft Carrier .28CVL.29|Regular Carriers]] cannot be used!'''
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 3#3-5|World 3-5]].
B32.label: B32
B32.title: 「戦艦部隊」北方海域に突入せよ！
B32.title_en: "Battleship Squadron" Charge into the Northern Sea Region!

B33.detail_en:
''Advance the "Nishimura Fleet" to the Southern Sea Region, charge and eliminate the enemy main fleet!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Fusou]], [[Yamashiro]], [[Mogami]], [[Shigure]], and [[Michishio]]. You may add an additional ship.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 5#5-1|World 5-1]].
B33.label: B33
B33.title: 「西村艦隊」南方海域へ進出せよ！
B33.title_en: Advance the "Nishimura Fleet" to the Southern Sea Region!

B34.detail_en:
''Using the "6th Squadron" with "Furutaka", "Kako", "Aoba", and "Kinugasa" as basis, eliminate the enemies at the sea around Okinoshima!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Furutaka]], [[Kako]], [[Aoba]], and [[Kinugasa]]. You may add additional ships. 
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-5|World 2-5]].
B34.label: B34
B34.title: 「第六戦隊」南西海域へ出撃せよ！
B34.title_en: Deploy the "6th Squadron" to the Southwest Sea Region!

B35.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet containing the "11th Destroyer Division" to the Orel Sea and eliminate the enemies!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Fubuki]], [[Shirayuki]], [[Hatsuyuki]] and [[Murakumo]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B35.label: B35
B35.title: 「第十一駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B36.detail_en:
''Send the "11th Destroyer Division" to the front of the naval base and carry out an anti-submarine patrol!
*Fleet Requirement: [[Fubuki]], [[Shirayuki]], [[Hatsuyuki]] and [[Murakumo]]<ref name="moreshipsimpractical" />.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a C-rank or better result at the boss node of [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]].
B36.label: B36
B36.title: 「第十一駆逐隊」対潜哨戒!

B37.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet including the "21st Destroyer Division'' to the Moray Sea in the Northern Sea Region and eliminate the enemies!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Hatsuharu]], [[Nenohi]], [[Wakaba]] and [[Hatsushimo]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 3#3-1|World 3-1]].
B37.label: B37
B37.title: 「第二一駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B38.detail_en:
''With a fleet consisting of flagship "Nachi", "Hatsushimo", "Kasumi", "Ushio", "Akebono", and 1 other ship, eliminate the enemies at the sea around Bashi Island!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Nachi]] (as flagship), [[Hatsushimo]], [[Kasumi]], [[Ushio]], [[Akebono]], and 1 other ship. 
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]].
B38.label: B38
B38.title: 「那智戦隊」抜錨せよ！

B39.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet including the "22nd Destroyer Division'' to the Nansei Islands Defense Line and eliminate the enemy main force fleet!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Satsuki]], [[Fumizuki]], [[Nagatsuki]] and one additional [[Ship_Class#Destroyer_.28DD.29|DD]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 1#1-4|World 1-4]].
B39.label: B39
B39.title: 「第二二駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B4.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet to the sea around Nansei Islands and battle the enemy fleet!''
*Completion Condition: Deploy to [[World 1#1-2|World 1-2]].
B4.label: B4
B4.title: 南西諸島沖に出撃せよ！
B4.title_en: Deploy to the Sea Around Nansei Islands!

B40.detail_en:
''Eliminate the enemy fleet at the Orel Sea with a fleet including "Maya Kai" or "Maya Kai Ni", a light cruiser, and two destroyers!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Maya|Maya Kai]] or [[Maya|Maya Kai Ni]], 1 [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|CL]] and 2 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|DD]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B40.label: B40
B40.title: 「改装防空重巡」出撃せよ！

B41.detail_en:
''Form the "Mikawa Fleet" as the first fleet, enter the Southern Sea Region, and eliminate the enemy fleets in the area!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Choukai#Second Upgrade|Choukai Kai Ni]] (flagship) plus 5 ships from the following: [[Furutaka]], [[Kako]], [[Aoba]], [[Kinugasa]], [[Yuubari]] and [[Tenryuu]].
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 5#5-1|World 5-1]].
B41.label: B41
B41.title: 新編「三川艦隊」ソロモン方面へ！
B41.title_en: Newly-Formed "Mikawa Fleet" to the Solomon Region!

B42.detail_en:
''Send the "6th Destroyer Division" to the front of the naval base and carry out an anti-submarine patrol!
*Fleet Requirement: [[Akatsuki]], [[Hibiki]] ([[Hibiki#Second Upgrade|Верный]] OK), [[Ikazuchi]] and [[Inazuma]]<ref name="moreshipsimpractical" />.
*Completion Condition: Obtain a C-rank or better result at the boss node of [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]].
B42.label: B42
B42.title: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒なのです！

B43.detail_en:
''Deploy the "18th Squadron" with "Tenryuu" and "Tatsuta" as basis and eliminate the enemy main force at the Orel Sea!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Tenryuu]] and [[Tatsuta]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B43.label: B43
B43.title: 抜錨！「第十八戦隊」

B44.detail_en:
''With a fleet composed of [[Hiei]], [[Kirishima]], [[Nagara]], [[Akatsuki]], [[Ikazuchi]], and [[Inazuma]], proceed to enter the Southern Sea Region and eliminate the enemy fleet!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Hiei]], [[Kirishima]], [[Nagara]], [[Akatsuki]], [[Ikazuchi]], and [[Inazuma]].
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 5#5-1|World 5-1]].
B44.label: B44
B44.title: 海上突入部隊、進発せよ！

B45.detail_en:
''Perform anti-submarine patrol with a fleet including the "6th Destroyer Division" and strike at the enemy submarine fleet!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Akatsuki|Akatsuki Kai Ni]], [[Hibiki]] (Верный OK), [[Ikazuchi]], [[Inazuma]]<ref name="moreshipsimpractical" />.
*Completion Condition: Obtain A-rank or better victory at the boss node of [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]].
B45.label: B45
B45.title: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒を徹底なのです！

B46.detail_en:
''Deploy the First Torpedo Squadron to Northern Seas of Kis Islands! Defeat the enemy vessels, and return safely!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Abukuma]](flagship), [[Hibiki]], [[Hatsushimo]], [[Wakaba]], [[Samidare]], and [[Shimakaze]] in the same fleet.
*Completion Condition: Get at least a B rank at the boss of [[World 3#3-2|World 3-2]]
B46.label: B46
B46.title: 「第一水雷戦隊」ケ号作戦、突入せよ！
B46.title_en: Deploy the [First Torpedo Squadron] for the K-Go!

B47.detail_en:
''Re-Deploy the First Torpedo Squadron to Northern Seas of Kis Islands to eliminate the enemy vessels completely, and return safely!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Abukuma]](flagship), [[Hibiki]], [[Yuugumo]], [[Naganami]], [[Akigumo]], and [[Shimakaze]] in the same fleet.
*Completion Condition: Get at least a S rank at the boss of [[World 3#3-2|World 3-2]]
B47.label: B47
B47.title: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方ケ号作戦、再突入！
B47.title_en: [First Torpedo Squadron], advance again to the Northern K-Go Operation!

B48.detail_en:
''Strengthen the anti-submarine patrol in front of the naval base and ensure the safeness of the transport routes by sea!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain 4 A-rank victories at the boss node of [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]].
B48.label: B48
B48.note: (For some admirals [[#Bd2|Bd2]] seems to be required)
B48.title: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化せよ！
B48.title_en: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base!

B49.detail_en:
''Deploy a mobile carrier fleet led by an aircraft carrier to the Northern AL Region and eliminate enemy forces!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 3#3-5|World 3-5]] with a CV or CVB ([[Taihou]]) flagship.
:*'''CVL''' doesn't satisfy the flagship condition.
B49.label: B49
B49.title: 「空母機動部隊」北方海域に進出せよ！
B49.title_en: "Mobile Carrier Fleet" Entering the Northern Sea Region!

B5.detail_en:
''Spot the "Enemy Vanguard Fleet" closing in on the sea around Nansei Islands and eliminate it!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 1#1-2|World 1-2]].
B5.label: B5
B5.title: 接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を迎撃せよ！
B5.title_en: Confront the "Enemy Vanguard Fleet" Closing in!

B50.detail_en:
''再編成した「第五航空戦隊」を珊瑚諸島沖に展開、敵機動部隊を捕捉撃滅せよ！''
*Completion Condition: Sortie [[Shoukaku]], [[Zuikaku]], [[Oboro]], [[Akigumo]] and up to 2 additional ships to [[World 5#5-2|World 5-2]] and score an S-rank victory at the boss node.
B50.label: B50
B50.title: 「第五航空戦隊」珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ！
B50.title_en: Sortie the "5th CarDiv" to the South

B51.detail_en:
''新編「第二一戦隊」を基幹とする艦隊で北方海域モーレイ海に出撃、敵を撃滅せよ！''
*Completion Condition: Sortie [[Nachi|Nachi Kai Ni]], [[Ashigara|Ashigara Kai Ni]], [[Tama]], [[Kiso]] and up to 2 additional ships to [[World 3#3-1|World 3-1]] and score an S-rank victory at the boss node.
B51.label: B51
B51.title: 新編「第二一戦隊」北方へ出撃せよ！

B52.detail_en:
''Deploy the 16th Cruiser Division (Primary) to the Bashi Islands and destroy the enemy fleet!''
*Completion Condition: Sortie [[Ashigara]] as the flagship, [[Kuma]], [[Nagara]] and up to 3 additional ships to [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]] and score an S-rank victory at the boss node.
B52.label: B52
B52.title: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！

B53.detail_en:
''Form the 3rd Carrier Division and deploy to the Southern Islands to intercept and destroy the enemy fleet!''
*Completion Condition: Sortie [[Zuikaku|Zuikaku Kai]] as the flagship, [[Zuihou]], [[Chitose]], [[Chiyoda]] and up to 2 additional ships to [[World 1#1-4|World 1-4]] and score an S rank victory at the boss node.
B53.label: B53
B53.title: 「第三航空戦隊」南西諸島防衛線に出撃！
B53.title_en: Sortie the 3rd Carrier Division to Protect the Nansei Islands!

B54.detail_en:
''Deploy the Ozawa Fleet to the Okinojima front to intercept and destroy the invading enemy fleet!''
*Completion Condition: Sortie [[Zuikaku|Zuikaku Kai]] as the flagship, aircraft carriers [[Zuihou|Zuihou Kai]], [[Chitose]], and [[Chiyoda]], and aviation battleships [[Ise|Ise Kai]] and [[Hyuuga|Hyuuga Kai]] to [[World 2#2-4|World 2-4]] and score an S rank victory at the boss node.
B54.label: B54
B54.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=3}}
{{QuestRewardEquip|Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)}}
B54.title: 「小沢艦隊」出撃せよ！

B55.detail_en:
''Deploy the "16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)" to the Orel Sea, spot and destroy the enemy fleet!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Natori]] (as flagship), [[Isuzu]], and [[Kinu]]. You may add other ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B55.label: B55
B55.title: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」出撃せよ！

B56.detail_en:
''Advance towards The Alfonsinoes and eliminate the enemy mobile task force near their anchorage!''
*Fleet Requirement: 2 DDs, 2 (CAV and/or BBV), and 2 CV(L).
*Completion Condition: Obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 3#3-3|World 3-3]].
B56.label: B56
B56.title: 新編成航空戦隊、北方へ進出せよ！
B56.title_en: New Carrier Division, Advance to the North!

B57.detail_en:
''Powerful "Surface Counterattack Fleet", advance to the Nansei Islands along the coast from Okinojima! Destroy the Enemy Forces in the area!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Kasumi]] (as flagship), [[Ashigara]], [[Ooyodo]], [[Asashimo]], and [[Kiyoshimo]]. You may add 1 other ship.
*Completion Condition: Obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-5|World 2-5]].
B57.label: B57
B57.title: 「礼号作戦」実施せよ！

B58.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet consisting of 4 Destroyers including Kasumi as the flagship to the Moray Sea location and engage the enemy!''
*Sortie with [[Kasumi|Kasumi Kai Ni]](Kai Ni Type B is also acceptable) as flagship along with 3 other DDs and 2 other ships to [[World 3#3-1|3-1]].  Gain a victory at the boss node (B rank at least)
B58.label: B58
B58.title: 旗艦「霞」北方海域を哨戒せよ！

B59.detail_en:
''Flag Kasumi Kai Ni, engage the enemy fleet off the coast of the Okinojima along the Nansei Islands and eliminate the enemy main forces!''
*Sortie [[Kasumi|Kasumi Kai Ni]] (Kai Ni Type B is also acceptable) as flagship along with 2 other DDs and 3 other ships to [[World 2#2-5|2-5]].  Gain an S-rank Victory at the boss node.
B59.label: B59
B59.title: 旗艦「霞」出撃！敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
B59.title_en: Deploy Flagship "Kasumi"! Eliminate the Enemy Fleet!

B6.detail_en:
''Deploy a light cruiser-led torpedo squadron with multiple destroyers!''
*Fleet Requirement: 1 [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|Light Cruiser]] (flagship) and 3 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|Destroyers]].
*Completion Condition: Send the fleet on any sortie.
B6.label: B6
B6.title: 「水雷戦隊」で出撃せよ！

B60.detail_en:
''Sortie the "31st Squadron (1st gen.) into the waters adjacent to the naval base and secure a safe passage along the route.''
* Sortie [[Isuzu#Second Upgrade|Isuzu Kai Ni]] as flagship, along with [[Satsuki#Second Upgrade|Satsuki Kai Ni]], [[Uzuki#Upgrade|Uzuki Kai]] and up to 3 additional ships to [[World 1#1-6|World 1-6]] and reach the end node.
B60.label: B60
B60.title: 「第三十一戦隊」出撃せよ！

B61.detail_en:
''Deploy the 27th Destroyer Division with [[Shiratsuyu#Upgrade|Shiratsuyu Kai]] as the flagship to the Orel Sea and eleminate the enemy forces!''
*Sortie [[Shiratsuyu#Upgrade|Shiratsuyu Kai]] (as the flagship), [[Shigure]], [[Harusame]], [[Samidare]] and two other ships to 2-3 and S rank the boss.
B61.label: B61
B61.title: 「第二七駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B62.detail_en:
''While carrying out a reconnaissance at [[World 6#6-3|Operation K]], improve your fleet's capabilities for launching an amphibious warfare landing!''
*Engage a sortie in [[World 6#6-3|World 6-3]] and score a victory (B-rank or above) at the boss node.
B62.label: B62
B62.title: 強襲上陸作戦用戦力を増強せよ！

B63.detail_en:
'' Deploy a torpedo squadron to the coastal oil refinery! Make sure to eliminate the enemy force lurking there 3 times!''
*Engage a sortie in [[World 1#1-3|World 1-3]] with a torpedo Squadron consisting of 1CL and the rest being DDs and score 3 S-ranks.
B63.label: B63
B63.title: 製油所地帯を防衛せよ！

B64.detail_en:
''Deploy a powerful fleet along the Nansei Island Defense Line! Destroy the enemy fleet here 5 times!''
*Engage a sortie in [[World 1#1-4|World 1-4]] and score an 5 S-ranks at Boss Node.
B64.label: B64
B64.title: 南西諸島防衛線を強化せよ！
B64.title_en: Strengthen the Nansai Island Defense Line!

B65.detail_en:
''Use [[Ooshio]] as flagship and conduct repeated sorties in the Eastern Orel Seas! Eliminate the enemy forces within the area.''
*Have [[Ooshio]] as your flagship with any other ship of choice and sortie at 2-3 and defeat the boss node 6 times with an S-rank.
B65.label: B65
B65.title: オリョール海の制海権を確保せよ！
B65.title_en: Obtain supremacy at the Orel Sea！

B66.detail_en:
''Deploy [[Ooshio|Ooshio Kai Ni]] as a flagship along with a powerful fleet and patrol the Northern AL Waters while engaging in combat.''
*Complete 3-5 using [[Ooshio|Ooshio Kai Ni]] as a flagship with any other ships of choices and score an S-rank at the boss node.
B66.label: B66
B66.title: 旗艦「大潮」出撃せよ！！

B67.detail_en:
''To commemorate the third anniversary, sortie to the coastal areas of the Bashi Islands and the Eastern Orel Sea, and eliminate the enemy forces within these areas!''
*Completion Condition: One S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]] and one S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
B67.label: B67
B67.title: 艦隊、三周年！！

B68.detail_en:
''Take Sendai Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni, and Kawakaze Kai Ni, along with two other destroyers in the fleet and carry out the Jam Island Capture Operation!''
*Take a fleet consisting of [[Sendai|Sendai Kai Ni]], [[Shigure|Shigure Kai Ni]], and [[Kawakaze|Kawakaze Kai Ni]], and two other DD in the same fleet and sortie and beat the boss node of [[World 4#4-1|4-1]] with an A rank or higher.
B68.label: B68
B68.title: 強行高速輸送部隊、出撃せよ！

B69.detail_en:
''Organize a Fleet with Akagi as the flagship along with Kaga as the core part of your fleet and engage in the Abyssal Eastern Ocean Fleet Reduction Operation!''
*Sortie with a fleet consisting of [[Akagi]] as the Flagship along with [[Kaga]] into [[World 4#4-5|4-5]] and win an S rank.
B69.label: B69
B69.title: 「第一航空戦隊」西へ！
B69.title_en: First Carrier Division, to the West!

B7.detail_en:
''Compose a fleet with a heavy cruiser as flagship and deploy it!''
*Fleet Requirement: 1 [[Ship Class#Heavy Cruiser .28CA.29|Heavy Cruiser]] as flagship.
*Completion Condition: Send the fleet on any sortie.
B7.label: B7
B7.title: 「重巡洋艦」を出撃させよ！

B70.detail_en:
''Take your newly reformed Torpedo Squadron to the Nansei Island Defense Line and eliminate the enemy forces within that direction!''
*Take a fleet consisting of a Light Cruiser Flagship and 4 Destroyers to 1-4 and S-rank the boss node.
B70.label: B70
B70.title: 新編艦隊、南西諸島防衛線へ急行せよ！
B70.title_en: Reformed Fleet, Set Sail to the Nansei Island Defense Line!

B71.detail_en:
''Set the newly reform Torpedo Squadron, and patrol the Local Naval Base Sea Route. Strive to ensure the safety of the route!''
* Take a fleet consisting of a Light Cruiser Flagship and 4 Destroyers to 1-6 and successfully return to base.
B71.label: B71
B71.title: 鎮守府近海航路の安全確保を強化せよ！
B71.title_en: Strengthen the Safety of the Local Naval Base Sea Route.

B72.detail_en:
''Reform the 31st Squadron (1st Gen) head to the Naval Waters Adjacent to the Naval Base Route, perform repeated sorties till the eliminate the enemy submarine forces.''
*Take a fleet consisting [[Isuzu|Isuzu Kai Ni]] (Flagship), [[Satsuki|Satsuki Kai Ni]], and [[Uzuki]] along with 3 other ships and complete a run on 1-6 twice.
B72.label: B72
B72.title: 「第三十一戦隊」敵潜を制圧せよ！

B73.detail_en:
''Take the Newly formed 8th Destroyer Division and sortie in the inshore route along the naval base waters! Strive to ensure and secure the route!''
*Take a fleet consisting [[Asashio|Asashio Kai Ni]] as the flagship, [[Ooshio]], [[Arashio]], and [[Michishio]] along with 2 other ships and complete a run on 1-6.
B73.label: B73
B73.title: 新編「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ!

B74.detail_en:
''Take your newly formed 8th Destroyer Division First platoon and engage in an anti submarine patrol near the naval base and launch a repeated assault to eliminate the hidden enemy!''
*Take a fleet consisting of [[Asashio|Asashio Kai Ni D]] as the flagship and [[Ooshio|Ooshio Kai Ni]] along with two other ships to 1-5 and S-rank the boss node 2 times.
B74.label: B74
B74.title: 精鋭！八駆第一小隊！
B74.title_en: Elite Force! 8th Destroyer Division First Platoon!

B75.detail_en:
''Organize and form an escort fleet consisting of a light cruiser flagship and 4 destroyers and conduct repeated sorties at the Nansei Island Defense Line, ensure naval supremacy over the waters.''
*Compose a fleet of a CL flagship and 4 destroyers (+1 other ship of choice), sortie to [[World 1#1-4|1-4]] and defeat the boss with an S rank twice.
B75.label: B75
B75.title: 水雷戦隊、南西防衛線に反復出撃せよ!
B75.title_en: Torpedo Squad, Repeatedly engage the Nansei Island Defense Line!

B76.detail_en:
''Organize and form a fleet consisting of a light Carrier flagship and 3 destroyers to the Oil Refinery Zone Coast. Carry out a patrol of the area to ensure the safety of the ocean waters.''
* With a Light Carrier flagship and 3 destroyers (+two other ships of choice), sortie to [[World 1#1-3|1-3]] and defeat the boss fleet with an S-rank.
B76.label: B76
B76.title: 製油所地帯沿岸の哨戒を実施せよ！
B76.title_en: Patrol the Oil Refinery Zone Coast!

B77.detail_en:
''Form a powerful torpedo squadron fleet and set sail to the Southwestern Seas to patrol the Bashi Islands and the Eastern Orel Sea. Within the same waters, capture and eliminate the enemy main fleet patrolling these waters.''
*Form a fleet consisting of 1 Light Cruiser (as a flagship), 4 Destroyers and a ship of your choice as defeat the boss nodes of 2-2 and 2-3 with an S rank(?)
B77.label: B77
B77.title: 水雷戦隊、南西諸島海域を哨戒せよ！
B77.title_en: Torpedo Squadron! Patrol the Southwestern Seas

B78.detail_en:
''Deploy the 4 Special Type Destroyers of the 19th Destroyer Division to the [[World_1#1-5|World 1-5 (Seas Near the Naval Base)]] and conduct a Naval Base anti submarine patrol around the area,strive to suppress and dominate the enemy submarine forces!''
* Sortie a fleet consisting of [[Ayanami]], [[Shikinami]], [[Uranami]], and [[Isonami]] to 1-5 and score an A rank at the boss node
B78.label: B78
B78.title: 「「第十九駆逐隊」出撃せよ！

B79.detail_en:
''Organize a powerful fleet which includes the "19th Destroyer Division" to the [[World_2#2-5|World 2-5 (Patrol off of Okinoshima)]] in the Nansei Islands! Capture the enemy flagship while paroling within that route and eliminate it!''
* Sortie a fleet consisting of [[Ayanami]], [[Shikinami]], [[Uranami]], and [[Isonami]] and (two other ships of choice) to 2-5 and score an A rank at the boss node
B79.label: B79
B79.title: 「第十九駆逐隊」敵主力に突入せよ！
B79.title_en: 19th Destroyer Division, Engage the Enemy Flagship!

B8.detail_en:
''Compose a fleet led by a battleship, the king of the seas, and deploy it!
*Fleet Requirement: 1 [[Ship Class#Battleship .28BB.29|Battleship]] as flagship.
**[[Ship Class#Aviation Battleship .28BBV.29|Aviation Battleships]] (BBVs) does not count.
*Completion Condition: Send the fleet on any sortie.
B8.label: B8
B8.title: 「戦艦」を出撃させよ！

B80.detail_en:
Conduct air reconnaissance in Operation K again and eliminate the enemy fleet along the route, then proceed to carry out preparations to construct a Land Air Base in the Central Waters!
*Go to 6-3 and score an S-rank at the boss node
B80.label: B80
B80.title: 飛行場設営の準備を実施せよ！

B81.detail_en:
Rush out an elite force to the Battle Off Sav Island, break through the enemy ambush, and attack the enemy landing forces!
*Go to 5-3 and score an A-rank at the boss node.
B81.label: B81
B81.title: 夜間突入！敵上陸部隊を叩け！
B81.title_en: Night Attack! Striking the Enemy Landing Force!

B82.detail_en:
Assemble a powerful fleet to the Cam Ranh Peninsula, while proceeding for replenishment, encounter the enemy fleet and eliminate them! Then you will obtain a "lantern" to illuminate the night sky. During a [[Saury|certain season]], it can be useful outside of night battles!
* Complete 2-1 with an S-rank on boss node
B82.label: B82
B82.title: 夜の海を照らす「灯り」を入手せよ！
B82.title_en: Obtain the 'Lantern' to light the Night Sea!

B83.detail_en:
Assemble a powerful fleet consisting of a seaplane tender or Aviation Cruiser as the Flagship and deploy them to the Nansei Island Defense Line, strength the same line of defense with the potential of your seaplanes. While in route, engage the enemy main fleet and eliminate them!
* Organize a Fleet consisting of a Seaplane Tender or Aviation Cruiser as a Flagship along with any other ships of choice and go 1-4 score an S-rank on boss node.
B83.label: B83
B83.title: 南西諸島防衛線を増強せよ！
B83.title_en: Reinforce the Nansei Island Defense Line!

B84.detail_en:
Deploy the 16th Squadron (3rd Gen) to the Okinoshima Sea Front and Capture and defeat the enemy Flagship Fleet!
*Deploy a fleet consisting of [[Kinu]], [[Aoba]], [[Kitakami]], and [[Ooi]] and 2 other ships of choice to 2-4 and score an A-rank or higher at the boss node.
B84.label: B84
B84.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Irako}}
Furniture: ''Floor of Kanmusu Cushions''
B84.title: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」出撃せよ！

B85.detail_en:
Assemble the newly formed "Elite 16th Division" and proceed to expand your your operation to the Nansei Island Waters to patrol off Okinoshima, while in route, engage the enemy Flagship fleet and eliminate them! 
* Organize a Fleet consisting of [[Kinu|Kinu Kai Ni]] (as flagship), and include 5 of the 6 following members in your fleet: [[Kitakami|Kitakami Kai Ni]], [[Ooi|Ooi Kai Ni]], [[Aoba|Aoba Kai]], [[Kuma|Kuma Kai]], [[Shikinami|Shikinami Kai]] and/or [[Uranami|Uranami Kai]]. Take fleet to 2-5 with an S-rank on boss node.
B85.label: B85
B85.title: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」突入せよ！

B86.detail_en:
With [[Kinu|Kinu Kai Ni]] as the flagship, organize a fleet of 5 consort ships consisting of [[Uranami|Uranami Kai]] and 3 other destroyers and conduct a "Weeping Willow Transport Operation" off Bashi Island, successfully complete the same transport Operation and report back!
* Organize a Fleet consisting of [[Kinu|Kinu Kai Ni]], [[Uranami|Uranami Kai]], 3 Destroyers of choice, and one other ship of choice. Take Fleet to 2-2 and score an S-Rank.
B86.label: B86
B86.title: 輸送作戦を成功させ、帰還せよ！
B86.title_en: Report the Success of a Transport Operation!

B87.detail_en:
Organize a Main fleet of four Heavy Cruisers with a Heavy Cruiser as flagship and expand across the [[World 2#2-3|Eastern Orel Sea]] in the Nansei Islands area, at the same time, eliminate the main enemy fleet to gain control of the sea area. 
*Take a fleet consisting of 4 CA/CAV with a CA/CAV as flagship and two other ships of choice to [[World 2#2-3|2-3]] and score an S rank at the boss node.
B87.label: B87
B87.title: 重巡戦隊、抜錨せよ！

B88.detail_en:
Deploy a Battleship organized fleet consisting of 2 Battleships with a Battleship as Flagship to [[World 3#3-3|The Alfonsinoes]] in the Northern Waters, eliminate the enemy battleship within the Northern Waters to regain control of the area.
*Take a Fleet consisting of 2 BB/FBB/BBV with a BB/FBB/BBV as Flagship, Two CV/CVL and two other ships of choice to [[World 3#3-3|3-3]] to the boss node and gain a victory there.
B88.label: B88
B88.note: Selectable reward; '''clicking on either will lock the choice in as your selection'''
B88.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=2}}
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai}} {{QuestRewardEquip|PBY-5A Catalina}}
B88.title: 戦艦戦隊、出撃せよ！

B89.detail_en:
Organize a Powerful Battleship Squadron consisting of 2 Battleships or Aviation Battleships and sail to the [[World 2#2-4|Okinoshima Islands]], capture the invading enemy fleet and eliminate them
*Take 2 BB/BBV + 4 other ships of choice to [[World 2#2-4|2-4]] and score an S-rank on the Boss Node.
B89.label: B89
B89.note: You can only choose between one of the two choice rewards
B89.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Irako}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Improved Kanhon Type Turbine}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Enhanced Kanhon Type Boiler}}
B89.title: 主力戦艦戦隊、抜錨せよ！

B9.detail_en:
''Deploy a mobile carrier fleet consisting a carrier and escorts!''
*Fleet Requirement: 1 [[Ship Class#Light Aircraft Carrier .28CVL.29|Light]] or [[Ship Class#Regular Aircraft Carrier .28CV.29|Standard]] Carrier and 3 ships from the following classes: [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|Destroyers]], [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|Light Cruisers]], or [[Ship Class#Seaplane Tender .28AV.29|Seaplane Tenders]].
*Completion Condition: Send the fleet on any sortie.
B9.label: B9
B9.title: 「空母機動部隊」出撃せよ！

B90.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of [[Arashio|Arashio Kai Ni]] as flagship and one of her colleagues from "Destroyer Division 8" and sortie to the Northern Area of the Solomon Sea to confront and eliminate the main enemy fleet within the area to reduce the enemy's strength in the area.
*Take [[Arashio|Arashio Kai Ni]] in the flagship position, along with one of the three following ships ([[Asashio]], [[Ooshio]] or [[Michishio]]), and up to four additional ships, sortie to 5-5 and score an A-rank in the Boss Node Twice.
B90.label: B90
B90.title: "精鋭「第八駆逐隊」突入せよ！

B91.detail_en:
Send your first fleet, which should be a powerful submarine fleet that consists of at least 4 strong submarines, one of them being the flagship, to the patrol line in the Central Waters, capture the enemy aircraft carrier that is navigating through the area, and attack it!
*Send a Fleet consisting of 4 SS(V) with an SS(V) as flagship, and two random ships of choice to 6-1 and score a B rank at the boss node.
B91.label: B91
B91.title: 潜水艦隊、中部海域の哨戒を実施せよ！
B91.title_en: Submarine Fleet, patrol the Central Waters!

B92.detail_en:
Deploy "Zara Due" as flagship of the first fleet and send said fleet to the Southern Sav Islands! Break through the enemy fleets in the area and crush the enemy forces that are deployed in Ironbottom Sound!
*Use a Fleet consisting of Zara Due as the flagship and go to 5-3 and score an A rank at the boss node.
B92.label: B92
B92.title: 重装甲巡洋艦、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！
B92.title_en: Heavy Armored Cruiser, Embark into the Iron Bottom Sound!

B93.detail_en:
Organize a Fleet consisting of a Light Cruiser as Flagship and deploy to the Nansei Island Defense Line, Bashi Islands, and Eastern Orel Sea and eliminate the main enemy Fleet in the area!
*Send a Fleet consisting of CL as Flagship and 5 other ships of choice and S rank at the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-2, and 2-3.
B93.label: B93
B93.reward_other: {{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Mamiya}} {{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Irako}}
B93.title: 鎮守府海域警戒を厳とせよ！
B93.title_en: Defeat the Enemy Fleet at the Nansei Islands!

B94.detail_en:
Organize a powerful fleet with a Carrier or Seaplane Tender as Flagship, deploy them to the Northern AL area, The Western Coast off from Casgadama, and off the Western Coast of the MS Islands and eliminate the main enemy fleet in the areas.
*Send a Fleet consisting of an AV, CVL, CV, or CVB as Flagship and 5 other ships of choice to 3-5, 4-4, and 6-2 and score an S-rank at the Boss nodes.
B94.label: B94
B94.title: 洋上航空戦力を拡充せよ！

B95.detail_en:
Form a powerful fleet with the remodelled aviation cruiser "Suzuya Kai-2" as flagship, deploy it to the Southern Sea, engage the enemy fleets that are patrolling the front part of the Southern Waters as well as Sav Island, and destroy them!
*Organize a fleet consisting of [[Suzuya|Suzuya Kai Ni]] as the flagship and score and A rank at the boss nodes of 5-1 and 5-3.
B95.label: B95
B95.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Kyoufuu Kai}} {{QuestRewardEquip|New Kanhon Design Anti-torpedo Bulge (Medium)}}
B95.title: 改装航空巡洋艦、出撃！

B96.detail_en:
Form a powerful fleet with the remodeled light attack carrier "Suzuya Kou Kai-2" and send it to the Central Waters. Engage the enemy task forces at the MS Archipelago and the KW Atoll and destroy them!
*Organize a fleet consisting of [[Suzuya|Suzuya Kou Kai 2]] as flagship and score an S rank the boss nodes at 6-2 and 6-5.
B96.label: B96
B96.reward_other: {{QuestRewardEquip|8cm High-angle Gun Kai + Additional Machine Guns}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber)}}
B96.title: 改装攻撃型軽空母、前線展開せよ！
B96.title_en: Deploy the remodeled light attack carrier to the front!

B97.detail_en:
Form a patrol fleet with a cruiser as flagship and at least two destroyers. Send the fleet on a patrol mission to the sea area near the naval base (Waters off of the Nansei Islands / Coastal Refinery Zone / Nansei Islands Defense Line / Seas Near The Naval Base)!
*Organize a fleet consisting of a Cruiser (CL, CA or CAV) as Flagship, 2 Destroyers and up to three other ships of choice and score an A rank on the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 1-4 and 1-5.
B97.label: B97
B97.title: 鎮守府海域警戒を厳とせよ！
B97.title_en: Vigilantly patrol the sea area near the naval base!

B98.detail_en:
Form an escort fleet with 3 or more DD or DE, then send them to the Coastal Refinery Zone, the Nansei Islands Defense Line, the Sea Near the Naval Base and the Sea Route Near the Naval base and score victories at those maps.
* Form a fleet with 3 or more DD or DE and S rank [[World 1#1-3|1-3]], [[World 1#1-4|1-4]] and [[World 1#1-5|1-5]] then clear [[World 1#1-6|1-6]].
B98.label: B98
B98.title: 海上護衛体制の強化に努めよ！

B99.detail_en:
Sortie with Nagato Kai Ni as the flagship and Mutsu Kai! Send them to the Curry Ocean off Sri Lanka and the Northern Salmon Sea to destroy the main enemy fleets there!
* Sortie a fleet with [[Nagato|Nagato Kai Ni]] (flagship), [[Mutsu|Mutsu Kai]] as the 2nd ship, and 4 additional ships to [[World 4#4-5|4-5]] and [[World 5#5-5|5-5]] and S rank both maps.
B99.label: B99
B99.title: 新編「第一戦隊」、抜錨せよ！

Bd1.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet, spot the enemy fleet, and eliminate it!''
*Completion Condition: Win a sortie battle.
Bd1.label: Bd1
Bd1.title: 敵艦隊を撃破せよ！

Bd2.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet and spot the enemy fleet "main force"! Eliminate it!''
*Completion Condition: Participate in a sortie battle.
**Despite the quest description suggesting otherwise... (And you don't have to win, either)
Bd2.label: Bd2
Bd2.title: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Bd2.title_en: Eliminate the Enemy Fleet Main Force!

Bd3.detail_en:
''Deploy all fleets! Encounter the wandering enemy fleets 10 times!''
*Completion Condition: Participate in 10 sortie battles.
Bd3.label: Bd3
Bd3.title: 敵艦隊を10回邀撃せよ！

Bd4.detail_en:
''Enemy carriers threaten our fleet. Spot them, eliminate them, and sink 3 of them!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 3 enemy [[Enemy Vessel#Standard Aircraft Carriers .28CV.29|Aircraft Carriers]] or [[Enemy Vessel#Light Aircraft Carriers .28CVL.29|Light Carriers]].
Bd4.label: Bd4
Bd4.note: Available only on days of the month ending in -3, -7, or -0
Bd4.title: 敵空母を3隻撃沈せよ！

Bd5.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet, spot the enemy resupply ships, and eliminate them!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 3 enemy [[Enemy Vessel#Transport Ships .28AP.29|Transport Ships]].
**Resupply ships are transport ships.
Bd5.label: Bd5
Bd5.title: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！

Bd6.detail_en:
''Sink 5 or more enemy transport ships to cut off the enemy supply line!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 5 enemy [[Enemy Vessel#Transport Ships .28AP.29|Transport Ships]].
Bd6.label: Bd6
Bd6.note: Available only on days of the month ending in -2 or -8
Bd6.title: 敵輸送船団を叩け！
Bd6.title_en: Strike at the Enemy Transport Fleet!

Bd7.detail_en:
''Deploy all fleets to the [[World 2|Nansei Island Sea Region]], spot multiple enemy fleet main forces, and eliminate them!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain 5 victories at boss nodes in [[World 2]].
Bd7.label: Bd7
Bd7.title: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！
Bd7.title_en: Gain Control of the Nansei Island Sea Region!

Bd8.detail_en:
''Deploy a fleet with sufficient anti-submarine capability and hunt the enemy submarines!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 6 enemy [[Enemy Vessel#Submarines .28SS.29|Submarines]].
Bd8.label: Bd8
Bd8.title: 敵潜水艦を制圧せよ！

Bm1.detail_en:
''Perform combat patrol off Okinoshima with the "5th Squadron", gain sight of the enemy main fleet and eliminate it!''
*Fleet Requirement: [[Haguro]], [[Myoukou]], and [[Nachi]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-5|World 2-5]].
Bm1.label: Bm1
Bm1.title: 「第五戦隊」出撃せよ！

Bm2.detail_en:
''Repeat sorties into the Central Sea Region Patrol Line with a fleet mainly consisting submarines and reduce the enemy forces!''
*Fleet Requirement: None (but due to branching rules, at least 3+ [[Ship Class#Submarine .28SS.29|SS]]/[[Ship_Class#Submarine_Aircraft_Carrier_.28SSV.29|SSV]] required)
*Completion Condition: Obtain 3 S-rank victories at the boss node of [[World 6#6-1|World 6-1]].
Bm2.label: Bm2
Bm2.title: 「潜水艦隊」出撃せよ！

Bm3.detail_en:
''Deploy a light cruiser-led torpedo squadron (maximum of 3 light cruisers and rest destroyers), and eliminate enemies at the Nansei Islands Defense Line!''
*Fleet Requirement: 1-3 [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|CLs]] (with 1 as flagship), 1 or more [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|DDs]], and no ships from any other classes.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 1#1-4|World 1-4]].
Bm3.label: Bm3
Bm3.title: 「水雷戦隊」南西へ！

Bm4.detail_en:
''Form a surface strike fleet with 3 battleships, 1 light cruiser and others, sortie to the Southern Sea Region, and eliminate the enemy fleet!''
*Fleet Requirement: Sortie only 3 of the following classes: Yamato-class, Nagato-class, Ise-class and Fusou-class [[List of battleships by upgraded maximum stats|Slow Battleships]] and exactly 1 [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|Light Cruiser]]. You may add additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 5#5-1|World 5-1]].
Bm4.label: Bm4
Bm4.note:
Required by [[#B32|B32]]
Only the named battleship classes mentioned in the quests can be used to complete the quest.
Bm4.title: 「水上打撃部隊」南方へ！

Bm5.detail_en:
''Strengthen the anti-submarine patrol in the seas in front of the naval base, suppress the enemy submarines, and establish a safe maritime convoy!''
*Fleet Requirement: None (but due to branching rules, no more than 4 ships can be used)
*Completion Condition: Obtain 10 A-rank or better victories at the boss node of [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]].
Bm5.label: Bm5
Bm5.title: 海上護衛強化月間

Bm6.detail_en:
''Form a mobile carrier fleet consisting of 2 carriers (and 2 destroyer escorts) and eliminate the enemy fleet at the Curry Ocean!''
*Fleet Requirement: 2 Carriers ([[Ship Class#Regular Aircraft Carrier .28CV.29|CV]], [[Ship_Class#Light_Aircraft_Carrier_.28CVL.29|CVL]], or [[Ship_Class#Armored_Aircraft_Carrier_.28CVB.29|CVB]]) and 2 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|DD]]. You may add 2 additional ships.
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 4#4-2|World 4-2]].
Bm6.label: Bm6
Bm6.title: 「空母機動部隊」西へ！
Bm6.title_en: Mobile Carrier Fleet, to the West!

Bm7.detail_en:
''Charge into the sea off Okinoshima with a destroyer-led surface raid fleet consisting of 1 heavy cruiser, 1 light cruiser, and 4 destroyers!''
*Fleet Requirement: 4 [[Ship Class#Destroyer .28DD.29|DD]] (with 1 as flagship), 1 [[Ship Class#Light Cruiser .28CL.29|CL]], and 1 [[Ship Class#Heavy Cruiser .28CA.29|CA]].
**'''[[Ship Class#Aviation Cruiser .28CAV.29|CAV]] cannot take the CA spot!'''
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at boss node of [[World 2#2-5|World 2-5]].
Bm7.label: Bm7
Bm7.title: 「水上反撃部隊」突入せよ！

Bm8.detail_en:
Marine Guard Mission: Form a maritime escort fleet that consists of one light carrier or light cruiser class ship and a total of at least three destroyers and/or coastal defence ships, then have it guard the sea around the Nansei Islands, carry out a maritime escort mission, the First Southern Operation, patrol the Nansei Islands, and destroy any enemies in the areas!

* Take a fleet consisting of 1 CL or 1 CVL, 3 DD/DE and up to 2 XX, then score a S rank(?) at [[World 1#1-2|World 1-2]], [[World 1#1-3|World 1-3]], [[World 1#1-4|World 1-4]] and [[World 2#2-1|World 2-1]].
Bm8.label: Bm8
Bm8.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Development Material|qty=4}} {{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=4}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=2}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Type 95 Depth Charge}} {{QuestRewardEquip|25mm Single Autocannon Mount|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Irako}}
Bm8.title: 兵站線確保！海上警備を強化実施せよ！
Bm8.title_en: Secure the Supply Lines! Strengthen the Marine Guard!

Bq1.detail_en:
Organize the Powerful Fleet and launch a repeated assault at the Okinoshima Sea Front, intercept the Enemy Task Force and eliminate them!
*Make a fleet and complete [[World 2#2-4|World 2-4]] with an S-rank at the boss node two times.
Bq1.label: Bq1
Bq1.title: 沖ノ島海域迎撃戦

Bq10.detail_en:
Military Gains Extra Operation: Deploy an elite fleet form the first fleet into the Southern Western Coast off Tawi-Tawi, Off the Southern coast of the Salmon Seas,Off the MS Island Region, and Off the KW Atoll and proceed to destroy the enemy.
*Score an S rank at the boss nodes of [[World 7#7-2|World 7-2]] (Part 2), [[World 5#5-5|World 5-5]], [[World 6#6-2|World 6-2]], and [[World 6#6-5|World 6-5]].
Bq10.label: Bq10
Bq10.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Ranking Point Reward|qty=400}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}} {{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Irako|qty=3}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Underway Replenishment|qty=4}}
Bq10.title: 戦果拡張任務！「Z作戦」後段作戦
Bq10.title_en: Military Gains Extra Operation: "Operation Z" Latter Operation

Bq11.detail_en:
Maritime Defense Patrol Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of one Light Carrier or Light Cruiser, 3 Destroyers or Destroyer Escorts. Deploy into the First Southern Operation, Nansei Island Patrol, Willow Transport, and Orel Patrol and destroy the main fleet within the areas.
*Organize a fleet consisting 1 CVL or CL, 3 DD or DE, and 2 XX and score an S rank at the boss nodes of [[World 1#1-4|World 1-4]], [[World 2#2-1|World 2-1]], [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]], and [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]].
Bq11.label: Bq11
Bq11.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Ranking Point Reward|qty=80}} {{QuestRewardItem|Present Box}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 94 Depth Charge Projector|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Drum Canister (Transport Use)|qty=2}}
Bq11.title: 南西諸島方面「海上警備行動」発令
Bq11.title_en: "Surface Security Actions" around the Nansei Archipelago Announcement

Bq12.detail_en:
Large-Scale Sortie Operation:  "Western Waters Operation" has been officially announced! Organize a strong fleet, conduct a full scale sortie across the entire Western Waters Area, and destroy all of the main opposing enemy forces within the areas.
*Score an S rank at the boss nodes of [[World 4#4-1|World 4-1]], [[World 4#4-2|World 4-2]], [[World 4#4-3|World 4-3]], [[World 4#4-4|World 4-4]], and [[World 4#4-5|World 4-5]].
Bq12.label: Bq12
Bq12.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Ranking Point Reward|qty=330}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Medal}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Daihatsu Landing Craft|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Rocket Development Material}}
Bq12.title: 発令！「西方海域作戦」

Bq13.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of Yuubari Kai Ni as Flagship along fleet of 2 or more 6th torpedo Squadron Destroyers or Yura Kai Ni among the fleet. With said fleet, sortie into the Southern Water Front Lines, The Southern Salmon Sea Area, the Central Waters off the Northern Area of Peacock Island and the KW Atoll area.
* Organize a fleet with [[Yuubari|Yuubari Kai Ni]] (or D /Toku) as flagship and at least 2 6th Torpedo Squadron DDs ([[Mutsuki]], [[Kisaragi]], [[Yayoi]], [[Uzuki]], [[Kikuzuki]], [[Mochizuki]]) or [[Yura|Yura Kai Ni]] in the fleet and 3-4 XX. With said fleet score an S rank in [[World 5#5-1|World 5-1]], [[World 5#5-4|World 5-4]], [[World 6#6-4|World 6-4]] and [[World 6#6-5|World 6-5]].
Bq13.label: Bq13
Bq13.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Ranking Point Reward|qty=390}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=10}} {{QuestRewardItem|Medal}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}}
Bq13.title: 拡張「六水戦」、最前線へ！
Bq13.title_en: Expanded 6th Torpedo Squadron, to the Front Lines!

Bq2.detail_en:
Ranking Points Boost Mission: Deploy the first fleet, consisting mainly of powerful ships, destroy the enemy fleets at Okinoshima Island in the Nansei Archipelago and the Guano Atoll Sea, then crush the enemy forces at Peacock Island in the northern area of the Central Waters!
*Organize a fleet and score an A rank at the boss nodes of [[World 2#2-4|World 2-4]], [[World 6#6-1|World 6-1]], [[World 6#6-3|World 6-3]], and S rank the boss node at [[World 6#6-4|World 6-4]].
Bq2.label: Bq2
Bq2.reward_other: {{QuestRewardItem|Food Supply Ship Irako|qty=3}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}} {{QuestRewardItem|Ranking Point Reward|qty=350}}
Bq2.title: 戦果拡張任務！「Z作戦」前段作戦　他
Bq2.title_en: Ranking Points Boost Mission! "Operation Z", First Part

Bq3.detail_en:
Route Convoy Mission: Assemble a Fleet consisting of 2 Aviation Battleships and/or Resupply Ships and conduct a convoy at the Sea Route Near Naval Base. Successfully complete the map 2 times.
*Assemble a fleet consisting of a combination of 2 BBVs and/or AOs along 4 XX and go to [[World 1#1-6|World 1-6]] and successfully beat the map twice.
Bq3.label: Bq3
Bq3.title: 強行輸送艦隊、抜錨！

Bq4.detail_en:
Reconnaissance Mission: Deploy a Reconnaissance Fleet consisting of 1 Seaplane Tender and 2 Light Cruisers as the main part of the fleet and deploy to the Guiano Atoll in the Central Waters! Perform repeated Air Reconnaissance of "Operation K"! Engage the enemy fleet on route and try to eliminate the main enemy Fleet!
*Take a fleet consisting of 1 AV and 2 CL, along with 3 XX to [[World 6#6-3|World 6-3]] and score an A rank twice.
Bq4.label: Bq4
Bq4.title: 前線の航空偵察を実施せよ！
Bq4.title_en: Carry out Air Reconnaissance in the Front Lines!

Bq5.detail_en:
Arctic Waters Defense Mission: Commence the Arctic Waters Defense. Deploy a Fleet consisting of at least 1 Light Cruiser to the Arctic Waters of the Moray Sea, Kiss Island, and the Alphonso. Make sure to secure control over the Arctic Waters Defenses.
* Sortie a Fleet consisting of 1CL and 5XX to [[World 3#3-1|World 3-1]], [[World 3#3-2|World 3-2]] and [[World 3#3-3|World 3-3]] and score an A-rank on the boss nodes.
Bq5.label: Bq5
Bq5.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardEquip|Combat Ration}}
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai 2|stars=3}} {{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}} {{QuestRewardItem|Medal}}
Bq5.title: 北方海域警備を実施せよ！

Bq6.detail_en:
Mandatory Tokyo Express Mission: Organize the 31st Destroyer Division to conduct a convoy operation in the Southern Salmon Sea Area. Conduct the Tokyo Express operation in the Iron Bottom Sound area while at the same time eliminating the main enemy forces several time.
* Assemble a Fleet consisting of [[Naganami|Naganami Kai Ni]] along with one of [[Takanami|Takanami Kai]], [[Asashimo|Asashimo Kai]] or [[Okinami|Okinami Kai]], along with 4XX and go to [[World 5#5-4|World 5-4]] and score an S Rank at the boss node twice.
Bq6.label: Bq6
Bq6.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Type 22 Surface Radar|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 13 Air Radar|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Action Report}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardItem|Present Box}}
Bq6.title: 精鋭「三一駆」、鉄底海域に突入せよ！
Bq6.title_en: Elite "31st Destroyer Division", storm into the Iron Bottom Sound Area

Bq7.detail_en:
Iron Bottom Sound Wartime Expansion: Organize a rushing fleet force consisting of 4 ship from the units of [[Choukai]], [[Aoba]], [[Kinugasa]], [[Kako]], [[Furutaka]], [[Tenryuu]]  or [[Yuubari]]. Rush into the Southern Waters Front lines, The Sav Islands, and the Salmon Sea Area. 

* Organize a fleet consisting of 4 ships among [[Choukai]], [[Aoba]], [[Kinugasa]], [[Kako]], [[Furutaka]], [[Tenryuu]] or [[Yuubari]], plus 2 XX, then score an S rank on [[World 5#5-1|World 5-1]], [[World 5#5-3|World 5-3]], and [[World 5#5-4|World 5-4]]
Bq7.label: Bq7
Bq7.title: 新編成「三川艦隊」、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！
Bq7.title_en: New Mikawa Fleet, rush into the Iron Bottom Sound!

Bq8.detail_en:
Coastal Anchorage Guard Expansion: Form a powerful anchorage patrol unit, then repeatedly sortie to the sea near the naval base, the Brunei Anchorage and the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage! Suppress the enemy submarines roaming each area, then engage and destroy the enemy forces that are becoming a threat to the area around the anchorages!

* Take a fleet and S rank the boss nodes of the following maps 3 times: [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]], [[World 7#7-1|World 7-1]], [[World 7#7-2|World 7-2]](Part 1), and [[World 7#7-2|World 7-2]](Part 2).
Bq8.label: Bq8
Bq8.reward_other:
{{QuestRewardItem|Ranking Point Reward|qty=300}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Skilled Lookouts}} {{QuestRewardItem|Skilled Crew Member}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Underway Replenishment|qty=4}}
Bq8.title: 泊地周辺海域の安全確保を徹底せよ！
Bq8.title_en: Thoroughly Secure the Sea Around the Anchorages!

Bq9.detail_en:
Organize a Patrol fleet that include an a Carrier, and patrol, the Oil Refinery Area(1-3), Nansei Island Defense Line (1-4), Nansei Island Front Waters (2-1), The waters of Bashi Strait (2-2) and the Eastern Orel Sea (2-3). Vigilantly patrol the area and engage the main enemy fleet in the area. 

* Organize a fleet with at least 1 CV(L)(B) in your fleet and sortie to [[World 1#1-3|World 1-3]], [[World 1#1-4|World 1-4]], [[World 2#2-1|World 2-1]], [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]], and [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]] and score an S rank at the boss nodes
Bq9.label: Bq9
Bq9.reward_other:
'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Development Material|qty=4}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Aerial Armament Material}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|Saiun}} {{QuestRewardItem|Skilled Crew Member}} {{QuestRewardItem|Present Box}}
Bq9.title: 空母戦力の投入による兵站線戦闘哨戒
Bq9.title_en: Utilize the supply line logistic of your Carrier Force!

Bw1.label: Bw1
Bw1.title: あ号作戦

Bw10.detail_en:
''Repeat anti-submarine patrol in front of the naval base and secure safe maritime transport routes!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain 3 A-rank or better victories at the boss node of [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]].
Bw10.label: Bw10
Bw10.title: 海上輸送路の安全確保に努めよ！
Bw10.title_en: Work on Securing Maritime Transport Routes!

Bw2.detail_en:
''Sortie for the week with a powerful carrier fleet and eliminate as many enemy carriers as possible!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 20 [[Enemy Vessel#Standard Aircraft Carriers .28CV.29|Aircraft Carriers]] ([[Enemy Vessel#Light Aircraft Carriers .28CVL.29|Light Carriers]] included).
*Despite the fact the quest description states otherwise, quest progress can be gained even if player's fleet does not have carriers.
Bw2.label: Bw2
Bw2.title: い号作戦

Bw3.detail_en:
''Sink 20 enemy transports within the week!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 20 [[Enemy Vessel#Transport Ships .28AP.29|Transport Ships]].
Bw3.label: Bw3
Bw3.title: 海上通商破壊作戦

Bw4.detail_en:
''Sortie with all forces for the week, spot & eliminate enemy transport fleets, and cut off enemy supply lines!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 50 [[Enemy Vessel#Transport Ships .28AP.29|Transport Ships]].
Bw4.label: Bw4
Bw4.title: ろ号作戦

Bw5.detail_en:
''With a maritime escort fleet capable of strong anti-submarine warfare, eliminate as many enemy submarines as possible!''
*Completion Condition: Sink 15 [[Enemy Vessel#Submarines .28SS.29|Submarines]].
Bw5.label: Bw5
Bw5.title: 海上護衛戦

Bw6.detail_en:
''Sortie to the [[World 4|Western Sea Region]], spot the main forces of enemy eastern fleet, and eliminate them!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain 12 victories at any boss nodes of [[World 4]].
Bw6.label: Bw6
Bw6.title: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！

Bw7.detail_en:
''Sortie to the depth of [[World 3|Northern Sea Region]], spot the main forces of enemy eastern fleet, and eliminate them!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain 5 victories at boss nodes of either [[World 3#3-3|World 3-3]], [[World 3#3-4|3-4]], or [[World 3#3-5|3-5]]).
Bw7.label: Bw7
Bw7.title: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Bw7.title_en: Eliminate Enemy Northern Fleet Main Forces!

Bw8.detail_en:
''Sortie to the Casgadama Island in the Western Sea Region, spot the enemy eastern core fleet, and destroy it!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain a victory at the boss node of [[World 4#4-4|World 4-4]].
Bw8.label: Bw8
Bw8.title: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！

Bw9.detail_en:
''Sortie to the Coral Islands in the Southern Sea Region, eliminate enemy mobile fleet, and gain complete victory!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain 2 S-rank victories at the boss node of [[World 5#5-2|World 5-2]].
Bw9.label: Bw9
Bw9.title: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖の制空権を握れ！
Bw9.title_en: Gain Air Superiority at the Coral Islands in the Southern Sea Region!

By1.detail_en:
Command an elite fleet including the remodeled Special II Type  Ayanami Kai Ni and Shikinami Kai Ni to the frontlines, spot and destroy the enemy main forces at Combat Patrol Off Okinoshima of Nanisei Island Waters, Throughout the Northern Sea in Northern Waters, Off the Curry Ocean torward Ri-Lanka in the Western Waters, and Sav Island in Southern Waters!
* Organize a fleet with [[Ayanami|Ayanami Kai Ni]] and [[Shikinami| Shikinami Kai Ni]], then score an S rank on the boss nodes of [[World 2#2-5|World 2-5]], [[World 3#3-4|World 3-4]], [[World 4#4-5|World 4-5]] and [[World 5#5-3|World 5-3]].
By1.label: By1

'''Then choose between:'''

By1.title: 精鋭「十九駆」、躍り出る！

By2.detail_en:
With a maritime escort fleet consisting of 5 or fewer ships of which 3 are destroyer escorts, secure and perform anti-submarine patrol at the waters of Sea in Front of the Naval Base, Sea around the Nansei Islands, Coastal Refinery Zone, Seas Near the Naval Base, and Sea Route Near Naval Base. Destroyer Escort Fleet, sortie!
* Organize a fleet of 3 DE and a total of 5 ships or fewer, then score an A(?) rank on [[World 1#1-1|World 1-1]], [[World 1#1-2|World 1-2]], [[World 1#1-3|World 1-3]], [[World 1#1-5|World 1-5]] and successfully complete [[World 1#1-6|World 1-6]].

{{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=6}} {{QuestRewardItem|Development Material|qty=8}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Furniture Fairy}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Type 2 Depth Charge}} {{QuestRewardItem|Medal}}
By2.title: 「海防艦」、海を護る！:

By3.detail_en:
Organize an escort fleet consisting of the repair ship Akashi as flagship, along with at least 3 Destroyers as the escort. With said fleet, proceed into the Oil Refinery Area, the Naval District Sea Route, the Nansei Island Patrol area, Bashi Channel, and the Eastern Orel Sea. Successfully delivered a successful battle using Akashi's escorts in the same areas.
* Organize a fleet with [[Akashi]] as flagship, 3 DD, 2 XX , then score an A? rank on the boss nodes of [[World 1#1-3|World 1-3]], [[World 2#2-1|World 2-1]], [[World 2#2-2|World 2-2]], [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]] and successfully complete [[World 1#1-6|World 1-6]].

{{QuestRewardEquip|Underway Replenishment}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Emergency Repair Material|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=5}} {{QuestRewardItem|Development Material|qty=6}}
By3.title: 工作艦「明石」護衛任務

By4.detail_en:
Organize a fleet consisting of at least 3 Heavy Cruisers (Not including Aviation Cruisers) and at least 1 or more Destroyers and advance into the Western waters of Jam Island, The Curry Ocean, Ri-Lanka, and Casgadama. Confront the main enemy fleets in the these locations and destroy them.
* Organize a fleet with 3 CA, 1 DD, 2XX , then score an A rank on the boss nodes of [[World 4#4-1|World 4-1]], [[World 4#4-2|World 4-2]], [[World 4#4-3|World 4-3]], and [[World 4#4-4|World 4-4]].

'''Choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardItem|Instant Repair Material|qty=5}} {{QuestRewardItem|New Model Gun Mount Improvement Material}} {{QuestRewardEquip|Anti-torpedo Bulge (Medium)}}
'''Then choose between:'''
{{QuestRewardEquip|20.3cm (No.2) Twin Gun Mount|qty=2}} {{QuestRewardItem|Improvement Material|qty=4}}
By4.title: 重巡戦隊、西へ！
By4.title_en: Heavy Cruiser Squadron, To the West!

By5.detail_en:
Organize a powerful fleet consisting of two ships, from among the heavy cruisers [[Haguro]], [[Ashigara]], [[Myouko]], and [[Takao]], and the destroyer [[Kamikaze]], which will serve as the main part of the fleet. Then do repeated sorties into the deepest part of the Penang Island Sea in the Malacca Strait, the deepest part of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage, and Wester Waters Curry Ocean Operation! Destroy the enemy in these locations!
* Organize a fleet with 2 historical ships which consist of the following: CA [[Haguro]], [[Ashigara]], [[Myouko]], [[Takao]] and/or DD [[Kamikaze]], and up to 4 XX and score an S rank on the boss nodes of [[World 7#7-2|World 7-2]] (Part 2), [[World 7#7-3|World 7-3]] (part 2) and [[World 4#4-2|World 4-2]] twice.

By5.title_en: Experienced "10th Area Fleet", Go all out!
