SB59.detail_en: Sortie a fleet with a [[BB|Battleship]], [[CV|Standard Aircraft Carrier]], or [[CVB|Armored Aircraft Carrier]] as flagship, 2 [[DD|Destroyers]], and up to 3 additional ships to Worlds [[5-4]], [[5-5]], and [[6-4]]. Obtain a S-rank at each boss node.
SB59.label: SB59
SB59.reward_other:
{{ItemCard|Setsubun Beans|size=30px}} x2
[[File:Ranking point reward.png|30px]] '''203 ranking points'''
SB59.title: 【節分拡張任務】令和二年節分作戦、全力出撃！
SB59.title_en: Weekly Setsubun Extra Mission: Reiwa 2nd Year Setsubun Operation, All-Out Sortie!

SC2.detail_en:
"Setsubun Mission" Organize a fleet consisting of 2 Destroyer or 2 Destroyer Escorts and carry out a Setsubun Exercise with said fleet! While performing the exercise for the 2nd Year of Reiwa, score a victory 3 times in the day!

* Organize a fleet with at least 2 DD/DE and 4 XX in your fleet and win 3 PVP with an S rank in a day.
SC2.label: SC2
SC2.title: 【節分任務】節分演習！

SF2.detail_en: Prepare 5000 Furniture Coins, 2 {{EquipmentLink|12cm Single Gun Mount}}, and 2 {{EquipmentLink|Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane}} in your inventory. Scrap 2 {{EquipmentLink|20.3cm Twin Gun Mount}}.
SF2.label: SF2
SF2.title: 節分特別任務：節分準備！

SF3.detail_en:
Prepare 5000 Furniture Coins, 2 {{EquipmentLink|Type 99 Dive Bomber}}, and 2 {{EquipmentLink|61cm Triple Torpedo Mount}} in your inventory. Scrap 2 {{EquipmentLink|14cm Single Gun Mount}}.
'''※ Prepared equipment must be unlocked.'''
SF3.label: SF3
SF3.title: 春の準備任務：桃の節句準備！

SN01.label: SN01
SN01.title: 第二次SN作戦、初動作戦完了！

SN03.label: SN03
SN03.title: 主力機動部隊の前路哨戒を実施せよ！

SN04.detail_en: Have {{ShipLink|Akagi}} as secretary equipped with a {{EquipmentLink|Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)}}.
SN04.label: SN04
SN04.title: 「赤城」に艦攻「村田隊」を配属せよ！

SN05.label: SN05
SN05.title: ソロモン海方面の制空権を奪え！

SN06.detail_en: Have {{ShipLink|Shoukaku}} as secretary equipped with a {{EquipmentLink|Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)}}.
SN06.label: SN06
SN06.title: 「翔鶴」に艦攻「村田隊」を配置転換せよ！

SN07.detail_en: Obtain a B-rank (or higher) in [[Exercises (PvP)|Exercises]] 4 times within the same day.
SN07.label: SN07
SN07.title: FS作戦に備え、艦隊練度向上に努めよ！

SN08.detail_en: Have {{ShipLink|Shoukaku}} as secretary equipped with a {{EquipmentLink|Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)}}. Scrap 2 {{EquipmentLink|Tenzan}}.
SN08.label: SN08
SN08.title: 「工廠」”機種転換

SN09.label: SN09
SN09.title: 西部方面派遣艦隊、出撃せよ！

SN10.detail_en: Have {{ShipLink|Zuikaku}}, {{ShipLink|Shoukaku}}, and {{ShipLink|Zuihou}} in your first fleet. Then create a [[Combined Fleet|Carrier Task Force]].
SN10.label: SN10
SN10.title: 空母機動部隊「第三艦隊」を編成せよ！

Su01.detail_en:
Collect 5 Rice, then make 1 Onigiri.
'''※ The quest must be active when you make the Onigiri in order to count.'''
Su01.label: Su01
Su01.title: 主計科任務【おにぎりを作る！】
Su01.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: "Time to make Onigiri!"

Su02.detail_en:
Collect 15 Rice, then make 3 Onigiri.
'''※ The quest must be active when you make the Onigiri in order to count.'''
Su02.label: Su02
Su02.reward_other:
'''Choice between'''
{{EquipmentLink|Type 2 Large Flying Boat|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|61cm Triple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount Late Model|text=true|image=30px}} x1
Su02.title: 主計科任務【おにぎりを振舞おう！】
Su02.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: "Treat everyone to some Onigiri!"

Su03.detail_en:
Collect 6 Rice, 2 Umeboshi, and 3 Nori, then make 1 High-Class Onigiri.
'''※ The quest must be active when you make the High-Class Onigiri in order to count.'''
Su03.label: Su03
Su03.reward_other:
'''Choice between'''
{{EquipmentLink|Skilled Lookouts|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher |text=true|image=30px}} x2
'''or'''
[[File:Instant repair 2.png|30px|link=Tutorial:_FAQ#What_are_buckets.3F]] x7
Su03.title: 主計科任務【高級おにぎりを作る！】
Su03.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: "Time to make High-Class Onigiri!"

Su04.detail_en:
Collect 12 Rice, 4 Umeboshi, and 6 Nori, then make 2 High-Class Onigiri.
'''※ The quest must be active when you make the High-Class Onigiris in order to count.'''
Su04.label: Su04
Su04.reward_other:
'''Choice between'''
{{EquipmentLink|Type 0 Fighter Model 52|text=true|image=30px}} x3
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|Shiden Kai 2|text=true|image=30px}} x2
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|New Model Aerial Armament Material|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''then choice between'''
[[File:Furniture fairy.png|30px|link=Furniture]][[Furniture|Furniture Fairy]] x1
'''or'''
[[File:Reinforcement_expansion_064_useitem.png|30px|link=Reinforcement Expansion]][[Reinforcement Expansion]] x1
Su04.title: 主計科任務【差し入れ！高級おにぎり】
Su04.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: "Supplies incoming! High-Class Onigiri"

Su05.detail_en:
Collect 8 Rice, 3 Umeboshi, 3 Nori, 4 Tea, then make 1 Ochazuke.
'''※ The quest must be active when you make the Ochazuke in order to count.'''
Su05.label: Su05
Su05.reward_other:
'''Choice between'''
{{EquipmentLink|Canned Mackerel|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|61cm Quadruple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount Late Model|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
[[File:Improvement Materials.png|30px|link=Akashi's_Improvement_Arsenal]] x7
Su05.title: 主計科任務【お茶漬けを作る！】
Su05.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: Time to make Ochazuke!

Su06.detail_en:
Collect 16 Rice, 6 Umeboshi, 6 Nori, and 8 Tea, then make 2 Ochazuke.
'''※ The quest must be active when you make the Ochazuke in order to count.'''
Su06.label: Su06
Su06.reward_other:
'''Choice between'''
{{EquipmentLink|Canned Mackerel|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
[[File:Reinforcement_expansion_064_useitem.png|30px|link=Reinforcement Expansion]][[Reinforcement Expansion]] x1
'''then choice between'''
{{EquipmentLink|Canned Mackerel|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|Type 3 Depth Charge Projector (Concentrated Deployment)|text=true|image=30px}} x1
Su06.title: 主計科任務【お茶漬け、夜食にどうぞ！】
Su06.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: "Here, have some ochazuke for supper!"

Su07.detail_en:
Collect 12 Rice and 6 Nori.
'''※ The prepared items will be consumed upon quest completion.'''
Su07.label: Su07
Su07.reward_other:
{{EquipmentLink|Canned Mackerel|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''then choice between'''
{{EquipmentLink|12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher|text=true|image=30px}} x1
'''or'''
{{EquipmentLink|25mm Triple Autocannon Mount|text=true|image=30px}} x1
Su07.title: 主計科任務【海苔巻きを作ろう！】
Su07.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: Let's make Nori Rolls!

Su08.detail_en:
Collect 24 Rice, 5 Umeboshi, 6 Nori, and 7 Tea, then make 1 Japanese Meal Set and 3 Onigiri.
'''※ The quest must be active when you make the Japanese Meal Set and Onigiri in order to count.'''
Su08.label: Su08
Su08.title: 主計科任務【和定食膳を作って完食！】
Su08.title_en: Accounting Department Mission: Make a Japanese set meal and eat up!

Su09.detail_en:
Collect 50 Rice, 15 Umeboshi, and 10 Tea. Then, have a [[DD|Destroyer]] as secretary equipped with a {{EquipmentLink|12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher}} in her '''first''' slot and a {{EquipmentLink|Type 2 Depth Charge}} in her '''second''' slot.
'''※ The equipped rocket launcher must be unlocked.'''
'''※ The equipped rocket launcher will be converted to the reward listed.'''
'''※ The prepared items will be consumed upon quest completion.'''
Su09.label: Su09
Su09.title: 主計科拡張任務【日の丸弁当、量産！】
Su09.title_en: Accounting Department Extra Mission: "Rising Sun Lunch Boxes for everyone!"

WA01.detail_en:
''Set a highly experienced (Lv90~99) ship girl as the First Fleet flagship and sort out feelings!''
*Completion Requirement: Set a ship between Lv90 and 99 as the first fleet flagship (a.k.a. Secretary Ship).
WA01.label: WA01
WA01.title: 式の準備！(その参)

WA02.detail_en:
''Set a ship girl that you've strengthened the bond with (Lv100+) as the First Fleet Flagship and compose a fleet of 6 ships!''
*Completion Condition: Compose a six-ship First Fleet with a Lv100+ flagship.
WA02.label: WA02
WA02.title: 新たなる旅立ち！

WB01.detail_en:
''Sortie with a highly experienced First Fleet Flagship, and gain victory in the dawn horizon of the Orel Sea!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 2#2-3|World 2-3]] with a ship between Lv90 and 99 as the first fleet flagship.
WB01.label: WB01
WB01.title: 式の準備！(最終)

WB02.detail_en:
''Sortie with the First Fleet led by a ship girl that you've strengthened the bond with to Ri Lanka Island and eliminate the enemy core!''
*Completion Condition: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of [[World 4#4-3|World 4-3]] with the First Fleet with a level 100+ flagship.
WB02.label: WB02
WB02.title: 二人でする初めての任務！

WC01.detail_en:
''Obtain 2 victories in [[Exercises (PvP)]] in order to sort out feelings for the ceremony!''
*Completion Requirement: 2 [[Exercises (PvP)]] victories during the same day.
WC01.label: WC01
WC01.title: 式の準備！(その弐)

WF01.detail_en:
''Prepare for the ceremony! Scrap equipment twice at the factory for the preparation!''
*Completion Condition: Scrap equipment 2 times.
WF01.label: WF01
WF01.title: 式の準備！(その壱)
